T06n1394u_001:29: pañca vijñānakāyāḥ svabhāvatasteṣāṃ cāśrayaḥ teṣāṃ cālambanaṃ teṣāṃ ca sahāyaḥ teṣāṃ ca karma samāsataḥ pañcavijñānakāyasamprayuktā bhūmiḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:48: pūrvakaṃ prapañcaratihetumupādāya yaḥ sarvabījako vipāko nirvṛttaḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:54: tadyathā nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitamavadātaṃ chāyātapa āloko'
T06n1394u_001:57: tadyathā dīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ vṛttaṃ parimaṇḍalamaṇu sthūlaṃ śātaṃ viśātaṃ unnatamavanataṃ ||
T06n1394u_001:59: tadyathādānaṃ nikṣepaṇaṃ samiñjitaṃ sthānaṃ niṣadyā śayyābhi kramo'
T06n1394u_001:66: tasyaiva pracitasya rūpasyotpannaniruddhasya vairodhikena kāraṇena janmadeśe cānutpattistadanyadeśe ca nirantare sāntare vā sannikṛṣṭe viprakṛṣṭe vā tasminneva vā deśe'
T06n1394u_001:70: vijñaptiḥ karma kriyā ceṣṭe hā parispanda iti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:71: sarvāsāṃ varṇṇasaṃsthānavijñaptīnāṃ cakṣurgocaraścakṣurviṣayaścakṣurvijñānagocaraścakṣurvijñānaviṣayaścakṣurvijñānālambanaṃ manovijñānagocaro manovijñānaviṣayo manovijñānālambanamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:72: punastadeva suvarṇṇaṃ vā durvarṇṇaṃ vā tadubhayāntarasthāyi vā varṇṇanibhaṃ ||
T06n1394u_001:77: ye'pyanye cakṣurvijñānena sahabhūsamprayuktāścaitasā dharmāste punarekālambanā anekākārāḥ sahabhūvaścaikaikavṛttayaśca |
T06n1394u_001:78: sarve ca svabījānnirjātāḥ samprayuktāḥ sākārāḥ sālambanāḥ sāśrayāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:99: tadyathā śaṅkhaśabdaḥ paṭahaśabdo bherīśabdo mṛdaṅgaśabdo nṛtyaśabdo gītaśabdo vāditaśabda āḍambaraśabdaḥ strīśabdaḥ puruṣaśabdo vāyuvanaspatiśabdo
T06n1394u_001:100: vyaktaḥ sārthako nirarthakaḥ parītto madhya ucco nadīśabdaḥ kalakalaśabda uddeśasvādhyāyadeśanāsāṅkathyavinirṇayaśabda ityevaṃbhāgīyā bahavaḥ śabdāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:109: tatra śabdo ghoṣaḥ svaro niruktirnādo vāgvijñaptiriti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:110: śrotragocaraḥ śrotraviṣayaḥ śrotravijñānagocaraḥ śrotravijñānaviṣayaḥ śrotravijñānālambanaṃ manovijñānagocaro manovijñānaviṣayo manovijñānālambanamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:124: gandhā anekavidhā anidarśanāḥ sapratighāḥ sugandhā vā durgandhā vā samagandhā vā ghrāṇīyāstadyathā mūlagandhaḥ sāragandhaḥ patragandhaḥ puṣpagandhaḥ phalagandha ityevamādayo bahavo gandhāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:125: tatra gandho ghrāṇīyo jighraṇīya āghrātavya ityevamādayaḥ paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:126: ghrāṇagocaro ghrāṇaviṣayo ghrāṇavijñānagocaro ghrāṇavijñānaviṣayo ghrāṇavijñānālambanaṃ manovijñānagocaro manovijñānaviṣayo manovijñānālambanamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:141: te punastiktāmlakaṭukaṣāyalavaṇamadhurā mānāpikā vāmānāpikā vopekṣāsthānīyāḥ svādanīyāḥ |
T06n1394u_001:143: bhyavahartavyo bhojyaṃ peyaṃ lehyaṃ cūṣyamupabhogyamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:144: jihvāgocaro jihvāviṣayo jihvāvijñānagocaro jihvāvijñānaviṣayo jihvāvijñānālambanaṃ manovijñānagocaro manovijñānaviṣayo manovijñānālambanamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:159: tadyathā pṛthivyāpastejo vāyurlaghutvaṃ gurutvaṃ ślakṣṇatvaṃ karkaśatvaṃ śītaṃ jighatsā pipāsā tṛptirbalaṃ daurbalyaṃ vyādhirjarā maraṇaṃ kaṇḍūrmūrcchā
T06n1394u_001:162: tatpunaḥ susaṃsparśaṃ vā dussaṃsparśaṃ vopekṣāsthānīyaṃ vā sparśanīyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_001:163: tatra spraṣṭavyaṃ spṛśyaṃ sparśanīyaṃ kharaṃ dravaṃ cala muṣṇamityādayaḥ paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:164: kāyagocaraḥ kāyaviṣayaḥ kāyavijñānagocaraḥ kāyavijñānaviṣayaḥ kāyavijñānālambanaṃ manovijñānagocaro manovijñānaviṣayo manovijñānālambanamiti paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_001:169: na ca tajjo manaskāraḥ pratyupasthito bhavati |
T06n1394u_001:178: tatra cakṣurvijñāna utpanne trīṇi cittānyupalabhyante yathākramamaupanipātikaṃ paryeṣakaṃ niścitaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_001:181: tatra niścitāccittātparaṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_001:185: tāvacca dvayormanovijñānacakṣurvijñānayoḥ kuśalatvaṃ vā kliṣṭatvaṃ yāvattanmano nānyatra vikṣipyate ||
T06n1394u_001:186: yathā cakṣurvijñāna utpanna evaṃ yāvatkāyavijñānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:9: yatṣaṇṇāmapi vijñānakāyānāmanantaraniruddhaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca mano yannityamavidyātmadṛṣṭyasmimānatṛṣṇālakṣaṇaiścaturbhiḥ kleśaiḥ samprayuktaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:19: saṃskṛtaṃ cānidarśanamapratighaṃ ca rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sarvabījāni ca ||
T06n1394u_002:22: manaskāraḥ sparśo vedanā saṃjñā cetanā chando'
T06n1394u_002:23: dhimokṣaḥ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā śraddhā hrīrapatrāpyamalobho'
T06n1394u_002:25: moho vīrya prasrabdhirapramāda upekṣāhiṃsā rāgaḥ pratigho'
T06n1394u_002:26: vidyā māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā krodha upanāhomrakṣaḥ pradāśa īrṣyāṃ mātsarya māyā śāṭhyaṃ mado vihiṃsāhrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ styānamauddhatyamāśraddhyaṃ kausīdyaṃ pramādo muṣitasmṛtitādhikṣepo'
T06n1394u_002:27: samprajanyaṃ kaukṛtyamiddhaṃ vitarko vicāraścetyevaṃbhāgīyāḥ sahabhūsampreyuktāścaitasā dharmāḥ sahāya ityucyante ekālambanā anekākārāḥ sahabhuva ekaikavṛttayaḥ svabījaniyatāḥ samprayuktāḥ sākārāḥ sālambanāḥ sāśrayāḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:33: punaḥ pravartanānuvartanā śuddhāśuddhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:35: api khalu sarveṇa sarvaṃ tadanyebhyo vijñānakāyebhyo vaiśeṣikaṃ karmāvalambanaṃ vikalpayatyālambanamupanidhyāti mādyatyunmādyati svapiti pratibudhyati mūrchāmāpadyate mūrchāyā vyuttiṣṭhati kāyavākkarma pravartayati vairāgyaṃ karoti vairāgyātparihīyate kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti kuśalamūlāni pratisandadhāti cyavata utpadyate ceti ||
T06n1394u_002:47: pratyupasthite viṣaye svarasena yo viṣayabalādeva vartate ||
T06n1394u_002:57: nyatamenānyatamena vā kleśopakleśena yaḥ samprayuktaḥ saṅkalpaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:62: nyatamānyatamena vā punaḥ śraddhādikena kuśalena dharmeṇa yaḥ samprayukto vikalpa airyāpathikaḥ śailpasthāniko vā nirmāṇaṃ nirmiṇvato vikalpaḥ
T06n1394u_002:73: nāpi sadbhūtamapavadate mithyādṛṣṭyā nāsti dattamityādyākārayā mithyādṛṣṭyā |
T06n1394u_002:74: dharmasthitijñāne vā punaryathābhūtaṃ vastu prekṣate parijānāti |
T06n1394u_002:86: prakṛtyāśrayadaurbalyatayā pariśramaklamadoṣatayā bhojanagauravatayāndhakāranimittamanasikāratayā sarvakarmāntaprativisrambhaṇatayā nidrābhyastatayā paropasaṃhāratayā ca |
T06n1394u_002:88: saṃvāhyamāno vā vidyayā vauṣadhairvā prabhāveṇā pasvāpyamānaḥ svapiti ||
T06n1394u_002:90: nidropavṛṃhitasya tatparyavasthānāsahanatayā karaṇīyasya tadābhogasvapanatayā paropasaṃhāratayā ca ||
T06n1394u_002:92: vātapittavibhramaṇatayā abhighātatayā ativirekatayā yaduta purīṣavirekeṇa vā śoṇitavirekeṇa vā viriktasya cātyadhyavasāyatayā ||
T06n1394u_002:101: prakṛtyā mṛdvindriyatayābhinavakuśalapakṣasya tadākāraliṅganimittamanasikāratayā parihāṇāya dharma samādāya vartanatayā kleśāvṛtatayā pāpamitraparigrahaṇatayā ca ||
T06n1394u_002:103: tīkṣṇendriyasyādhimātraṃ pāpāśayādhyācāradharmasamanvāgatatayā tadanulomamitralābhatayā tasya ca mithyādṛṣṭiparyavasthānasya ghanīkaraṇaparyantopagamanatayā sarvapāpādhyācāreṣvasaṃkocākaukṛtyapratilābhatayā ca ||
T06n1394u_002:109: prakṛtyā tīkṣṇendriyatayā mitra jñātisahāyakānāṃ puṇyakriyābhisaṃyogasandarśanatayā satpuruṣānupasaṅkamya saddharmaśravaṇatayā vicikitsotpattiniścayādhigamanatayā ca ||
T06n1394u_002:121: nava hetavo nava pratyayā akṣīṇāyuṣaḥ kālakriyāyā iti |
T06n1394u_002:123: amātrābhojī bhavati apathyabhojī apariṇatabhojī āmaṃ nāddharati pakkaṃ dhārayati bhaiṣajyaṃ na pratiṣevate sātmyāsātmyaṃ na jānīte akālacārī bhavati abrahmacārī bhavatīti |
T06n1394u_002:128: yenāsya tasminsamaye kuśalāḥ śraddhādayo dharmāścitte samudācaranti |
T06n1394u_002:130: sūkṣme punaḥ saṃjñāpracāre kuśalaṃ cittaṃ vyāvartate |
T06n1394u_002:133: sa tasminsamaye pūrvābhyastaṃ ca kuśalamābhogaṃ kartumasamartho bhavati parairapi smārayitumaśakyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:137: tasya tasminsamaye lobhādisahagatā akuśaladharmāścitte samudācaranti yāvadaudārikī saṃjñā .....iti pūrvavatsarvaṃ kuśalavat |
T06n1394u_002:139: tasya pragāḍhā duḥkhā vedanāḥ kāye nāvakrāmanti māraṇāntikāḥ |
T06n1394u_002:146: kuśalākuśalakārī vā tadakārī vā svayamasamanusmaranparairvāsmāryamāṇo naiva kuśalacitto na kliṣṭacitto mriyamāṇaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:147: sa naiva sukhamaraṇena mriyate naiva duḥkhamaraṇena |
T06n1394u_002:148: sa ca punaḥ kuśalākuśalakārī pudgalo mriyamāṇaḥ svayaṃ vā pūrvābhyastānkuśalākuśalāndharmānsmarati parairvā smāryate |
T06n1394u_002:149: tasya tasminsamaye yadabhyāsabāhulyādbalavattaraṃ bhavati tena cittaṃ namate'
T06n1394u_002:151: sacetpunarubhayaṃ samamabhyastaṃ bhavati tatra yadeva tatprathamataḥ samanusmarati samanasmāryate vā na punarvyāvartate nānyataścitta parāvartate
T06n1394u_002:152: sa tasminsamaye hetudvayamadhipatīkṛtvā yaduta prapañcābhiratihetuṃ ca śubhāśubhakarmahetuṃ ca kālaṃ kurvannupayukte tasminpūrvakarmākṣipte
T06n1394u_002:156: yadasya pūrvakaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ tattasya tasminsamaye sāyāhnakāla iva parvatānāṃ vā parvatakūṭānāṃ vā chāyevāvalambate'
T06n1394u_002:160: etadviparyayeṇa punaḥ pūrvakakuśala karmaphale varttamāna iha kuśalakārī tamojyotiṣparāyaṇo veditavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:163: sya svapna ivāvikṛtaṃ manāpavicitraṃ rūpadarśanaṃ prādurbhavati ||
T06n1394u_002:168: ākāśaparāmarśanamakṣi parivartanaṃ mukhataḥ phenaniḥsravaṇa mityevaṃbhāgīyā dharmā utpadyante ||
T06n1394u_002:169: sa cetpunarmadhyakārī bhavati tasya kecidvikārā bhavanti kecinna bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:171: sarvasya ca mriyamāṇasya vispaṣṭasaṃjñāvasthāmaprāptasya dīrghakālābhyasta ātmasnehaḥ samudācarati |
T06n1394u_002:175: tatra srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaśca tasminsamaya ātmasnehaḥ samudācarati |
T06n1394u_002:176: sa ca srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī vā tamātmasnehaṃ nitīrya nitīryābhinigṛhṇāti nādhivāsayati |
T06n1394u_002:177: tadyathā balavattarapuruṣo durbalatareṇa puruṣeṇa yudhyamāno durbalamabhinigṛhṇāti tadvadatrāpi nayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:178: anāgamināṃ tu sa ātmasnehastadā naiva samudācarati ||
T06n1394u_002:179: tatra marmacchedo narakagatiṃ devagatiṃ ca sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣu sarvajanmāyataneṣu bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:196: anantara samutpannatvācca tasyātmabhāvasnehasya pūrvaprapañcābhiratihetuparibhāvitatvācca śubhāśubhakarmaparibhāvitatvācca tasyāśrayasya taddhetudvayamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā svabījādantarābhavasya taddeśanirantarasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:201: sukṛtakāriṇāṃ punastadyathāvadātasya vastrasya nirbhāsaḥ sajyotsnāyā vā rātryāḥ |
T06n1394u_002:202: sa ca viśuddhasya divyasya cakṣuṣo gocarībhavati |
T06n1394u_002:203: tasminsamaye sa pūrvaka ātmabhāvābhilāṣo na punaḥ samudācarati vijñānasya pratiṣiddhatvāt |
T06n1394u_002:206: tasya ca divyacakṣuriva cakṣurna vyāhanyate yāvadupapattyāyatanāt |
T06n1394u_002:207: gatirapi na vihanyate yathā ṛddhimato yāvadupapattyāyatanādeva |
T06n1394u_002:208: sa tena cakṣuṣātmasabhāgānāntarābhavikān sattvānpaśyati teṣāṃ copapattisthānamātmanaśca |
T06n1394u_002:215: alābhe punaścutvā punaḥ saptāhaṃ tiṣṭhati yāvatsapta saptāhāni tiṣṭhatyupapattipratyayamalabhamānaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:220: tasya punaḥ paryāyā antarābhava ityapyucyate maraṇabhavotpattibhavayorantarāle prādurbhāvāt |
T06n1394u_002:226: sacetpunastenākuśalakarmakāriṇaurabhrikabhūtena vā kokkuṭikabhūtena vā saukarikabhūtena vā ityanyatamānyatamasminnasaṃvarikanikāye vyavasthitena narakasaṃvartanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ sa tathābhūtāneva sattvāṃstathā karmāṇyupapattyāyatane paśyati tāṃścorabhrādīnsvapnavat
T06n1394u_002:230: tasmāccyavamānasya yathāpūrva maraṇabhave vyākulaṃ rūpadadarśanaṃ tathaiva bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:234: ebhirahaṃ sārdhaṃ krīḍiṣyāmi ramiṣyāmi paricārayiṣyāmi śilpaṃ śikṣiṣyāmīti |
T06n1394u_002:235: sa tatra viparyāsādvividhaiḥ karma kāraṇaiḥ kāryate |
T06n1394u_002:237: anyathā punastādṛśaṃ darśanaṃ vinā tasya tatra gamanābhilāṣa eva na syāt |
T06n1394u_002:240: yathā naraka evaṃ narakasadṛśeṣu preteṣūtpādo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:241: galagaṇḍādiṣvanyeṣu punastiryakpreteṣu manuṣyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu rūpāvacareṣu ca devanikāyeṣūpapadyamāna ātmasabhāgānabhipramodamānānsattvānpaśyatyupapattyāyatane
T06n1394u_002:245: tatra trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ sammukhībhāvānmātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntirbhavati |
T06n1394u_002:250: ntarāyo na bhavati yonidoṣakṛto bījadoṣakṛtaḥ karmadoṣakṛtaśca |
T06n1394u_002:252: sacedyonirvātopastabdhā bhavati pittopastabdhā vā tilamadhyā vā śakaṭamukhī vā śaṅkhamukhī vā saliṅgā savaṅkā sadoṣā sakaṣāyetyevaṃ bhāgīyā yonidoṣā veditavyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:257: māturvā pūtiko bhavati piturvā tadubhayorvetyevaṃ bhāgīyā bījadoṣā veditavyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:259: sacenmātrā vā pitrā vā putrasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma na kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitamubhābhyāṃ vā |
T06n1394u_002:260: punastena vā sattvena mātāpitṛsaṃvartanīyaṃ karma na kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:261: tābhyāṃ vā mātāpitṛbhyāmanyādṛśaputrasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:262: tena vā sattvenānyādṛśamātāpitṛsaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:266: tasya mātāpitṛsambhūte śukraśoṇite viparyasta darśanaṃ tadā pravartate |
T06n1394u_002:268: mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca paśyatyanyonyaṃ vipratipadyamānaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:271: tāṃ ca vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya tatra saṃrāga utpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:272: sacetstrī bhavitukāmo bhavati puruṣe saṃrāgaḥ sa vāsecchotpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:273: sacetpuruṣo bhavitukāmo bhavati tasya striyāṃ saṃrāgaḥ saṃvāsecchotpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:276: tadutpādācca puruṣameva vā kevalaṃ paśyati striyaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_002:277: sa ca yathā yathā taṃ deśamupaśliṣyate tathā tathāsya tadanyeṣāmaṅgānāṃ darśanamavahīyate |
T06n1394u_002:278: yonidarśanaṃ vā puruṣendriyadarśanaṃ vā kevalaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:283: kuleṣu pratyājāyate tasya cyutikāle praveśakāle ca kolāhalaśabdo naḍavanagahanādipraveśaśca nimittaṃ prādurbhavati ||
T06n1394u_002:285: tasya praśāntamadhuraśabdaprādurbhāvaḥ prāsāda vimānādisthānārohaṇaṃ ca nimittaṃ prādurbhavati |
T06n1394u_002:289: dvayorapi ca tau śukraśoṇitabindū mātureva yonau miśrībhūtau śaraṃ baddhā tiṣṭhata ekapiṇḍībhūtau tadyathā pakkaṃ payaḥ śītabhāvamāpadyamānaṃ
T06n1394u_002:294: tannirodhasamakālaṃ ca tasyaiva sarvabījakasya sāmarthyāttadanyasūkṣmendriya mahābhūtavyatimiśro'
T06n1394u_002:297: sācāsau kalalāvasthā tāni ca tasya kalasyendriyamahābhūtāni kāyendriyeṇaiva sahotpadyante |
T06n1394u_002:298: indriyādhiṣṭhānamahābhūtāni ca tairevendriyamahābhūtaiḥ kāyendriyeṇa ca sahotpadyante |
T06n1394u_002:300: indriyāṇāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānānāṃ ca prādurbhāvātkṛtsna āśrayo niṣpanno bhavati pratilabdhaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:301: tatpunaḥ kalalarūpaṃ taiścitta caitasikairdharmairanyonyayoga kṣematayā sammūrcchitamityucyate |
T06n1394u_002:305: yatra ca kalaladeśe tadvijñānaṃ sammūrcchitaṃ so'
T06n1394u_002:307: evaṃ hi tadvijñānaṃ yasmādeva deśāccyavate tasminneva deśe tatprathamataḥ sammūrchati |
T06n1394u_002:308: tatpunaḥ sarvabījakaṃ vijñānaṃ parinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ paripūrṇabījamaparinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ punastrividhabodhibījavikalaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:317: tatra pṛthivīdhātumupādāya rūpaṃ vardhate vistīrṇataratāṃ gacchati |
T06n1394u_002:323: kulabalarūpāyurbhogādikasya tu phalasya prādhānyena śubhāśubhaṃ karma kāraṇaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:324: tatra cātmabhāve bālānāmahamiti vā mameti vāsmīti vā bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:328: tadanyattu sarvaṃ veditaṃ vipākajaṃ vā viṣayapratyayaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_002:335: prādurbhūte ca phala upayuktaphalaṃ bhavati tadbījaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:336: evaṃ hi saṃsāraprabandhaḥ pravartate yāvanna parinirvāti |
T06n1394u_002:337: yāni punastatrādattaphalāni bījāni tāni kānicidupapadya vedanīyāni bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:343: yasya ca bījasya tasminnātmabhāve phalaṃ pratisaṃvedyamapi pratyayavaikalyānna pratisaṃvedyate'
T06n1394u_002:345: ataḥ sarvātmabhāvabījakatvātpratyekaṃ sarvātmabhāvānāmekatra rajyamānaḥ sarvatra rakto vaktavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:347: teṣu punarātmabhāveṣu yāni bījāni kleśapakṣyāṇi tatra dauṣṭhulyānuśaya saṃjñā |
T06n1394u_002:348: yāni ca punarvipākapakṣyāṇi tadanyāvyākṛtapakṣyāṇi ca teṣu dauṣṭhulyasaṃjñaiva nānuśayasaṃjñā |
T06n1394u_002:349: yāni punaḥ śraddhādikuśaladharmapakṣyāṇi bījāni teṣu naivānuśayasaṃjñā dauṣṭhulyasaṃjñā |
T06n1394u_002:352: ataśca sakalamāśrayaṃ dauṣṭhulyopagatatvāddauṣṭhulyasvabhāvāttathāgatā duḥkhataḥ prajñāpayanti yaduta saṃskāraduḥkhatayā ||
T06n1394u_002:353: bījaparyāyāḥ punardhāturgotraṃ prakṛtirhetuḥ satkāyaḥ prapañca ālaya upādānaṃ duḥkhaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭyadhiṣṭhānamasmimānādhiṣṭhānaṃ cetyevambhāgīyāḥ paryāyā veditavyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:354: parinirvāṇakāle punarviśuddhānāṃ yogināṃ parivṛttāśrayāṇāṃ sarvakliṣṭadharmanirbīja āśrayaḥ parivartate |
T06n1394u_002:362: sa punaḥ sampūrṇo bhavati navabhirmāsaiḥ pareṇa vā punariti |
T06n1394u_002:364: ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhirvā māsairasampūrṇa eva vikalo vā |
T06n1394u_002:365: tasyāṃ punaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāvasthāyāṃ māturabhyantarajātaudariko rasoyenāsya puṣṭirbhavati |
T06n1394u_002:366: kalalādyāsu punaḥ sūkṣmatarāsvavasthāsu sūkṣmeṇa rasena puṣṭirveditavyā ||
T06n1394u_002:370: kalalāvasthā arbudāvasthā peśyavasthā ghanāvasthā praśākhāvasthā keśaromanakhāvasthā indriyāvasthā vyañjanāvasthā ca |
T06n1394u_002:379: tataḥ pūrvakarmavaśānmātrā ca viṣamāparihaṇā dviṣamāparihārajaiśca garbhe tadanukūlairvāyubhiḥ keśavaikṛtyaṃ varṇavaikṛtyaṃ tvagvaikṛtyamaṅgavaikṛtyaṃ ca jāyate ||
T06n1394u_002:381: pūrvaṃ tāvadanena tatsaṃvarṇanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:382: mātā vāsya kṣāralavaṇarasaprāyamannapānaṃ bāhulyena niṣevate yena mandakeśaromatāgarbhasya bhavati ||
T06n1394u_002:394: yenāsya dadrulatā vā kacchulatā vā kuṣṭhalatā vā tvagdoṣā jāyante ||
T06n1394u_002:397: vartamānaḥ pratyayo mātā dhāvanaplavanalaṅghanādīnīryāpathānadhyāpadyate yenāsya viṣamāparihārādaṅgavaikṛtyaṃ jāyate indriyavaikalyaṃ vā bhavet
T06n1394u_002:398: [sacet]punastrī bhavati sa pṛṣṭhavaṃśaṃ niśrityoraḥ saṃpuraskṛtya vāme pārśve māturavatiṣṭhate |
T06n1394u_002:399: sacetpumān bhavati sa uro niśritya pṛṣṭhavaṃśaṃ saṃpuraskṛtya dakṣiṇe pārśve māturavatiṣṭhate ||
T06n1394u_002:400: sampūrṇe ca punastasmingarbhe māturadhimātraṃ garbhamasahamānāyā adhyātmabhavā vātāḥ prādurbhavanti ye'
T06n1394u_002:402: tasya ca karmavipākajā upapattyaṃśikā vāyavo jāyante |
T06n1394u_002:404: tataḥ sa garbhaḥ kośapariveṣṭita eva niṣkrāmati |
T06n1394u_002:405: niṣkrāmataḥ punaḥ sa kośaḥ kukṣau bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:407: sa jātaḥ krameṇaupapatyaṃśikaṃ ca sparśaṃ spṛśati |
T06n1394u_002:412: karmāṇi ca karoti yaduta laukikāni śilpakarmasthānāni |
T06n1394u_002:414: sa duḥkhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayate yaduta pūrvakarmapratyayaṃ vā vartamānapratyayaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_002:415: yathā pratyayahāryaśca bhavati yaduta pañcagatigamanapratyayairvā nirvāṇagamanapratyayairvā ||
T06n1394u_002:416: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ yasminsattvanikāya ātmabhāvasya prādurbhāvo bhavati tatra yā sattvasabhāgatā sā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayakāryaṃ karoti |
T06n1394u_002:420: tato jātaṃ viditvā tadupamenāhāreṇa stanyena cāpāyayanti poṣayanti saṃvardhayanti |
T06n1394u_002:425: no tu sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamavāpnuvanti yāvanna buddhānāṃ bodhimāgamya parato ghoṣānvayādadhyātmaṃ ca yoniśo manasi kārādāsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti
T06n1394u_002:433: sacetsaṃvartasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tato bāhyena saṃvartapratyayena teṣāṃ saṃvarto bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:437: bāhyabhāvā rūpiṇa audārikāścāturmahābhūtikā sthāvarasantatayaśca na tu tathādhyātmikāḥ |
T06n1394u_002:438: teṣāṃ ca bhājanānāṃ yadvivartasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma tanniyataṃ kalpākṣepakaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:443: tasmāt teṣāṃ pareṇāpi kalpādbhavati tataścārvānyāvaddaśa saṃvatsarāditi ||
T06n1394u_002:448: caturthe punardhyāne teṣāṃ caturthadhyānabhūmikānāṃ devānāṃ sahaiva vimānairutpattiḥ |
T06n1394u_002:453: dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ caturtha dhyānaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:464: brahmakāyikānāṃ viṃśatirantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvāyuṣo vyavasthānaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:465: brahmapurohitānāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvā yuṣo vyavasthānaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:466: mahābrahmaṇāṃ ṣaṣṭirantarakalpāḥ kalpa iti kṛtvāyuṣo vyavasthānaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:468: sa samayo yadāparimitāyuṣaḥ sattvā āyuṣā hīyamānā yāvadaśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:469: te punarakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samādānahetorhīyamānā yāvaddaśavarṣāyuṣo bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:470: te punaḥ saṃvegaprāptānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samādānahetorāyuṣā vardhamānāḥ punaryāvadaśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣo bhavantīti yaścāyamapakarṣo yaścāyamutkarṣastaddvayam abhisamasyāntarakalpa ityucyate |
T06n1394u_002:472: tasya punarantarakalpasya tribhirniyāṇaṃ bhavati durbhikṣeṇa rogeṇa śastreṇa ca |
T06n1394u_002:474: evaṃrūpaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ prajñāyate yajjīrṇāsthyapi kvāthayitvā yātrāṃ kalpayati |
T06n1394u_002:475: yacca tatra kadācit kathañcidyavakalaṃ vā taṇḍulakalaṃ vā kola kulatthatilakalaṃ vādhigacchati taṃ maṇiratnamiva samudge prakṣipya vikarṣati
T06n1394u_002:476: te ca sattvā yadbhūyasā nisthāmāḥ pṛthivyāmuttānakā nipatitā utthātumapi na śaknuvanti |
T06n1394u_002:477: evaṃrūpeṇa durbhikṣeṇa yadbhūyasā sattvāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti ||
T06n1394u_002:480: te ca sattvāḥ saṅgamya samāgamya mṛdukaṃ saṃvegaṃ labhante |
T06n1394u_002:481: teṣāṃ tena hetunā tena pratyayenāyuṣaścāhānirbhavati durbhikṣasya ca vyāvṛttiḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:483: tasyaiva saṃvegasya punarvigamāddhīyamānāstadā bahava ītaya upadravā upāyāsā bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:485: sa punasteṣāṃ rogaḥ paraṃ saptamāsānsapta cāhorātrāṇi bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:488: tena hetunā tena pratyayena punarāyuṣā na hīyante |
T06n1394u_002:491: tasyaiva saṃvegasya vigamādāyuṣā hīyamānāstadā teṣāmanyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvraṃ vadhakacittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:492: tataste yadeva tṛṇaṃ vā śarkarāṃ vā kaṭhallaṃ vā gṛhṇanti tāni bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi suniśitāni |
T06n1394u_002:496: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tadā paramāstisro vipattayo bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:514: cattvāriṃśadapakarṣoktarṣā yadā niryātā bhavanti tadā sarvapaścima utkarṣe narakebhyaḥ sattvāścyavante nopapadyante |
T06n1394u_002:515: sakalacyutau ca teṣāṃ saṃvṛtto loko vaktavyo yaduta narakasaṃvartanyā |
T06n1394u_002:517: manuṣyeṣu punaranyatamaḥ sattvo dharmatāpratilambhiko yāvaddvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
T06n1394u_002:519: pi sattvā dharmatāpratilambhikā yāvadvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharanti |
T06n1394u_002:521: tadā cāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvṛtto vaktavyo yaduta manuṣyasaṃvartanyā |
T06n1394u_002:524: pi sattvo na prajñāyate tadopakaraṇa sambhavo'
T06n1394u_002:527: pi na prajñāyate tadā vṛṣṭirapi na prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_002:531: ṣaṭprakāradāhyavastvadhikārataścāpareṣā sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati yaduta sattvānāmeva saṃvartanīkarmādhipatyataḥ |
T06n1394u_002:533: te punaḥ sapta bhūtvā sapta guṇaṃ tāpayanti |
T06n1394u_002:536: kunadyo mahānadyo yāsāṃ tṛtīyena sūryamaṇḍalena śoṣaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:537: anavataptaṃ mahāsaro yasya caturthena sūryamaṇḍalena śoṣaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:541: sumerurmahāpṛthivī ca yayoḥ ṣaṣṭhenaiva saptamena ca sūryamaṇḍalena sārataravigrahatayā dāhaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:542: tata eva cārcirvāyunā preritā yāvadbrahmalokaṃ dahantī paraiti ||
T06n1394u_002:544: apsambhavaṃ vastu tṛṇādayo yeṣāṃ prathamenaiva śoṣaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:546: sthāvaraṃ sāravigrahaṃ vastu yasya dvābhyāṃ dāhaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:547: tasya khalu lokasanniveśasyaivaṃ dagdhasya dhmātasya yathāsūtrameva vistareṇa masirapi na prajñāyate chārikāpi na prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_002:548: iyatā lokaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati yaduta bhājanasaṃvartanyā |
T06n1394u_002:552: yataśca sapta tejaḥsaṃvartanyaḥ samatikrāntā bhavanti tato dvitīye dhyāne sahajo'
T06n1394u_002:558: tivṛttā bhavanti tataḥ punarekā tejaḥsaṃvartanī bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:559: tadanantaraṃ tṛtīye dhyāne sahajo vāyudhātuḥ sambhavati |
T06n1394u_002:569: tatra tatprathamata ākāśe tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ vivartate |
T06n1394u_002:573: tatra tṛtīyātsaṃvartaśīrṣātsattvā āyuḥkṣayātpuṇyakṣayāccyutvā tṛtīye dhyāna upapadyante |
T06n1394u_002:577: prathamātpunaḥ saṃvartanīśīrṣādanyatamaḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayādyāvatpuṇyakṣayāccyutvā prathamadhyāna upapadyate |
T06n1394u_002:584: pi sattvā āyuḥkṣayādyāvatpuṇyakṣayād dvitīyād dhyānāccyuttvā prathama eva dhyāna upapadyante |
T06n1394u_002:590: tataḥ paścādiha trisāhasramahāsāhasra lokadhātu pramāṇaṃ vāyumaṇḍalamabhinirvartate trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokasya pratiṣṭhābhūtamavaimānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:599: tasyāṃ vivṛttāyāṃ punastasyopari tatkarmādhipatyādeva nānādhātugarbho meghaḥ sambhavati |
T06n1394u_002:604: graḥ śreṣṭhaḥ praṇīto dhātustato vāyusaṃhāra vaśena sumeruḥ sañjāyate catūratnamayaḥ suvarṇamayo rūpyamayaḥ sphaṭikamayo vaidūryamayaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:605: yaḥ punastatra madhyo dhātustasmātsapta kāñcanaparvatā abhinirvartante |
T06n1394u_002:613: tata uttarottarārdhapramāṇatayā tadanyeṣāṃ kāñcanaparvatānāṃ vinatakādīnāṃ nimindharaparyavasānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:614: teṣāmeva ca parvatānāṃ yāni kūṭāni tatprakāraprabhedasādharmyeṇa teṣāmapi tāni nāmāni draṣṭavyāni ||
T06n1394u_002:615: hīnātpunardhātoścaturṣu sumerupārśveṣu bahiḥ kāñcanaparvatānāṃ catvāro dvīpā antardvīpāścāṣṭau cakravāḍaśca parvato nimindharasya parvatasyārdhapramāṇena
T06n1394u_002:635: teṣāṃ punaḥ saptānāṃ kāñcanaparvatānāmantarāle yadudakaṃ tadaṣṭāṅgopetaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:640: śvataro mucilindo manasvī dhṛtarāṣṭro mahākāla elapatraśca ||
T06n1394u_002:650: prathamāyāṃ karoṭapāṇayo dvitīyāyāṃ rudhirapāṇayastṛtīyāyāṃ sadāmadāścaturthyāṃ mālādharāḥ |
T06n1394u_002:651: uparimerutale caturṣu koṇeṣu catvāraḥ kūṭāḥ pañcayojanaśatocchrāyāḥ |
T06n1394u_002:653: yugandharasya ca caturṣu pārśveṣu mahārājānāṃ rājadhānyaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:656: himavataḥ parvatarājñaḥ sāmantakena surapārśvo nāma kāñcanamayaḥ prāgbhāraḥ pañcāśadyojanāyāmastāvadvistāra eva |
T06n1394u_002:659: tatra ca supratiṣṭhito nāma vṛkṣarājaḥ saptatālapaṃktiparivāraḥ |
T06n1394u_002:660: mandākinī ca puṣkariṇī śataparivārā tasyaiva supratiṣṭhitasya krīḍābhūmiḥ |
T06n1394u_002:661: yatrāsau kāmarūpī bhūtvā tasyāḥ puṣkariṇyā basamṛṇālānyāvṛhya paribhuṃkte |
T06n1394u_002:663: tasyaiva sāmantakenānavataptaṃ mahāsaraḥ pañcāśadyojanagambhīraṃ pañcāśadyojanavistāraṃ suvarṇavālukāstṛtamaṣṭāṅgopetapānīyasampannamabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:666: tasmiṃśca sumerutale devapurī sanniviṣṭā daśayojanasahasraparimāṇā dairdhyeṇa vaipulyena ca |
T06n1394u_002:677: anavataptasya saraso dakṣiṇabhāgena mahājambūryasya nāmnāyaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:687: te ca bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā ityanusūtrameva sarva |
T06n1394u_002:697: yaśca prabhūtataraṃ bhuṅkte sa durvarṇataro bhavati gurukakāyataraḥ |
T06n1394u_002:703: tataḥ strīpuruṣasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇaikatyānāṃ strīndriyaṃ prādurbhavati ekatyānāṃ puruṣendriyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:711: evaṃ tasya ca kṣatriyamaṇḍalasya yathāsūtraṃ brāhmaṇavaiśyaśūdramaṇḍalānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:713: tataḥ sūryācandramasornakṣatrāṇāṃ ca loke prādurbhāvo bhavati ||
T06n1394u_002:718: tayoḥ punaścandramaṇḍalaṃ śīghrataragati ca veditavyamaniyatagati ca |
T06n1394u_002:723: te punaryadā śliṣṭāḥ sumerorvahanti tadā nidāghaḥ prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_002:724: yadā viśliṣṭā bhavanti tadā hemantaḥ prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_002:729: yathā yathā vaṅkībhavati tathā tathā suṣṭhutaraṃ sampūrṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate |
T06n1394u_002:730: kṛṣṇapakṣe punaryathāyathāvamūrdhībhavati tathā tathā hrāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate |
T06n1394u_002:731: mahāsamudre matsakacchapādīnāṃ prativimbakotpādānmadhye candramasaḥ śyāmatā prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_002:732: nakṣatrāṇāṃ punaḥ parimāṇaṃ paramaṣṭādaśa krośā madhyānāṃ daśa krośāḥ sūkṣmāṇāṃ catvāraḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:734: tato'nyatamaḥ sattvaḥ saṃkliṣṭenādhipatyasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā yamo rājotpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:735: tasyānantaraṃ narakapālā nirmitopamā utpadyante yātanākāraṇānirvartakā lohādayo nārakaścāgniḥ prādurbhavati |
T06n1394u_002:736: tataste yathākarmopagāḥ sattvāstatrotpadyante tadanyāsu ca gatiṣu ||
T06n1394u_002:737: evaṃ kṛtvā koṭiśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭiśataṃ sumerūṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devanikāyānāṃ koṭiśataṃ brahmalokānāṃ trisāhasreṣu yugapadvivartate saṃvartate ca |
T06n1394u_002:739: sāhasrikaścūḍikastadyathā sahasraṃ candrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ sūryāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yāvadbrahmalokānāmaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya |
T06n1394u_002:740: yatkhalu cūḍikānāṃ sahasraṃ sa dvisāhasro madhyaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:741: yatkhalu madhyānāṃ sahasraṃ sa trisāhasro mahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:743: nāstyanto nāsti paryanto lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvartamānānāṃ vivartamānānāṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:744: tadyathā varṣādhāre deve varṣati nāsti vīcirvāntarikā vā vāridhārāṇāṃ prapatantīnāṃ sarvāsu dikṣu evameva sarvāsu dikṣu |
T06n1394u_002:745: nāstyanto nāsti ca paryanto lokadhātūnāṃ saṃvartamānānāṃ ca vivartamānānāṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:747: yatra tathāgatā utpadya buddhakarmāṇi kurvantyaparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu ||
T06n1394u_002:748: evaṃ ca punarvivṛtte lokasanniveśe pañca gatayaḥ prajñāyante nārakāstiryañcaḥ pratā devā manuṣyāśca |
T06n1394u_002:754: rdhamāso divaso rātriḥ kṣaṇastatkṣaṇo lavo muhūrtaśca |
T06n1394u_002:762: yaśo sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ nindā praśaṃsā ca |
T06n1394u_002:780: bījaphalasaṃgṛhītā nārakāḥ skandhā yacca karma narakavedanīyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:788: ye sattvā jarāyupariveṣṭitā jarāyuṃ bhittvā nirgacchanti |
T06n1394u_002:820: kavaḍaṅkāra āhāraḥ sparśo manaḥsañcetanā vijñānaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:824: ātmā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsaṃ karmakara pauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kṣetravastu gṛhavastu āpaṇavastu puṇyakriyāvastu karmāntaprayogavastūni kośasannidhiśca saptamaṃ vastu ||
T06n1394u_002:827: bhojanaṃ pānaṃ yānaṃ vastramalaṅkāro hāsyagītanṛtyavāditaṃ gandhamālyavilepanaṃ bhāṇḍopaskara ālokaḥ strīpuruṣaparicaryā ca ||
T06n1394u_002:831: tadyathā kaupīnapracchādanaṃ kāyaparicaryeryāpathāntarakalpa āhāraḥ svapno maithunaṃ tatpratisaṃyukto vyāyāmastatpratisaṃyuktā ca kathā ||
T06n1394u_002:845: tadyathā kaṃsakūṭatulākūṭamānakūṭamithyākarmāntaprayogo kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivāda ākrośanaṃ roṣaṇaṃ paribhāṣaṇaṃ tarjanaṃ tāḍanaṃ vadho bandhanaṃ rodhamaṃ chedanaṃ pravāsanaṃ śāṭhyaṃ vañcanaṃ nikṛtirmṛṣāvādaśca ||
T06n1394u_002:848: tadyathā nārakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā kṣatriyā brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ striyaḥ puruṣāḥ paṇḍakā hīnā madhyāḥ praṇītā gṛhiṇaḥ pravrajitāḥ
T06n1394u_002:849: kaṣṭatapasaḥ sāṃvarikā asāṃvarikā naivasāṃvarikānāsāṃvarikā vītarāgā avītarāgā mithyātvarāśiniyatāḥ samyaktvarāśiniyatā aniyatarāśiniyatā bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ śikṣamāṇāḥ śrāmaṇerāḥ śrāmaṇerya upāsakāḥ upāsikā prahāṇikāḥ svādhyāyakārakā vaiyāvṛtyakarāḥ sthavirā madhyā navakā ācāryā upādhyāyāḥ sārdhavihāriṇo'
T06n1394u_002:850: ntevāsikā āgantukāḥ saṅghavyavahārakā lābhakāmāḥ satkārakāmāḥ saṃlikhitā bahuśrutā jñātamahāpuṇyā dharmānudharmapratipannāḥ sūtradharā vinayadharā mātṛkādharāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ dṛṣṭasatyāḥ śaikṣā aśaikṣāḥ śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāstathāgatāścakravartinaśca ||
T06n1394u_002:853: dvidvīpikasya tāmramayaṃ tridvīpikasya rūpyamayaṃ caturdvīpikasya suvarṇamayaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:856: tadyathā garbhāvasthā jātāvasthā dahrāvasthā kumārakāvasthā yuvāvasthā madhyāvasthā vṛddhāvasthā jīrṇāvasthā ca |
T06n1394u_002:859: jīrṇāvasthāyāṃ dahrāvasthāyāṃ ca na parisarpaṇakrīḍanasamartho bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:881: śvakāyo rathakāyaḥ pattikāyaḥ sannidhibalaṃ mitrabalaṃ ca ||
T06n1394u_002:891: ārogyamado yauvanamado jīvitamadaḥ kulamado rūpamada aiśvaryamadaḥ śrutamadaśca ||
T06n1394u_002:893: dṛṣṭo vyavahāraḥ śruto mato vijñāto vyavahāraḥ |
T06n1394u_002:895: yadanena bahirdhā pratyakṣīkṛtaṃ bhavati cakṣuṣā tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharatyayamucyate dṛṣṭo vyavahāraḥ |
T06n1394u_002:897: yatparataḥ śrutaṃ bhavati tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharati |
T06n1394u_002:899: yadanena na dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati na śrutamapi tu svayameva cintitaṃ tulitamupaparīkṣitaṃ tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharati ||
T06n1394u_002:901: yadanenādhyātmaṃ prativeditaṃ bhavatyadhigataṃ sparśitaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ ca bhavati tadupādāya yatpareṣāṃ vyavaharatyayamucyate vijñāto vyavahāraḥ
T06n1394u_002:913: jātirjarā yāvadicchāvighātaḥ śokaḥ paridevo yauvanamārogyaṃ jīvitaṃ priyasamprayogo'
T06n1394u_002:921: tadetpañcākāraṃ vastu svabhāvādikaṃ karmaparyavasānaṃ tribhiḥ sthānaiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:930: sarveṣāmādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhūtānāmupādāyarūpāṇāṃ cādhyātmaṃ cittasantatau bījāni sanniviṣṭāni |
T06n1394u_002:931: tatra tāvadupādāyarūpabījamupādāya rūpaṃ janayati yāvadbhūtabījena bhūtānyajanitāni bhavanti |
T06n1394u_002:932: bhūteṣu punarjāteṣu tadupādāyarūpaṃ svabījādevotpadyamānaṃ tadupādāya jātamityucyate tajjātipūrvaṅgamatvāt |
T06n1394u_002:942: āhāramāgagya svapnaṃ vā brahmacaryavāsaṃ vā samādhiṃ vā tadāśritaṃ bhūyobhāvavṛddhivaipulyatāṃ gacchati |
T06n1394u_002:944: idaṃ copādāyarūpe mahābhūtānāṃ pañcākāraṃ kāritraṃ veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:961: tadyathā bhūtaparamāṇo rūpaśabdagandharasa spraṣṭavyānāmanindriya indriyavarjyānāṃ sendriye sendriyāṇāmekadeśāvinirbhāgaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:965: tasya punaḥ kṛtsnasya rūpasamudāyasya vividhadravyaśilāniṣpiṣṭāpsamāyuktavanmiśrībhāvā vinirbhāgo draṣṭavyo no tu tilamudgamāṣakulattharāśivat
T06n1394u_002:966: sarvaṃ copādāyarūpaṃ mahābhūtadeśāśritameva na mahābhūtadeśamatiricya vartate ||
T06n1394u_002:970: ata eva ca mahābhūtānāṃ mahābhūtamiti saṃjñā |
T06n1394u_002:973: tadyathā pṛthivyāpastejo vāto rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni cakṣurādīni ca rūpāṇi pañcendriyāṇi sthāpayitvā manogocarameva rūpaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:979: dhātusaṃgraheṇa punaryaḥ samudāyo yāvaddhātukaḥ sa tāvadbhirdravyaiḥ saṃgṛhīto vaktavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:980: avinirbhāgasaṃgrahaḥ punaryāvanto dharmā lakṣaṇato yasmin samudāya upalabhyante tāvadbhirdravyaistasya samudāyasya saṃgraho veditavya ādhyātmike vā bāhye vā samudāye |
T06n1394u_002:983: tadyathā pāṣāṇa muktāvaidūryaśaṅkhapravāḍādiṣu utsasarastaḍāganadīprasravaṇādiṣu arciḥpradīpolkādiṣu pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottaravāyumaṇḍalasarajaskārajaskavāyvādiṣu ca |
T06n1394u_002:988: tapteṣu teṣveva vṛkṣādiṣu samīriteṣu vā punaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:992: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā yadadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ keśādayaḥ purīṣaparyavasānāḥ ayamādhyātmikaḥ pṛthavīdhātuḥ |
T06n1394u_002:994: yenāyaṃ kalpa ātapyate santapyate yasya cotsadatvājjvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati sa tejodhātuḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1010: citta sanniviṣṭasya ca rūpasamudāyabījasya sāmarthyādubhayamapratyayasānnidhye kadācidaṇukasya samudāyasyānantaraṃ mahataḥ samudāyasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:1029: tatra sarvasmin rūpasamudāye sarveṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ dhāturvidyate sarvakālaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1031: tathā pāṣāṇa...agnirjāyate tathā loha rūpyasuvarṇādīnāṃ pragāḍhāgnisamprataptānāṃ dravatotpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:1032: tathā candrakāntādapāmevamṛddhimataścittādhimokṣavaśācca pṛthivyādīnāṃ suvarṇādīnāṃ ca prādurbhāvo bhavati ||
T06n1394u_002:1034: tribhiḥ srotobhiḥ pravṛttirbhavatyaupacayikena naiṣyandikena vipākajena ca |
T06n1394u_002:1035: tatraupacayikaṃ dvividhaṃ deśavyāptaupacayikaṃ lakṣaṇa puṣṭaupacayikaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1038: vipākajaṃ dvividhaṃ vipākatvena ca jātaṃ vipākajaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1043: tatra cittacaitasakalāpe citaṃ copalabhyate caitasāśca tripañcāśadupalabhyante |
T06n1394u_002:1045: eṣāṃ caitasānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kati sarvatra citta utpadyante sarvabhūmike sarvadā sarve ca |
T06n1394u_002:1048: kati sarvatrotpadyante sarvabhūmike na ca sarvadā na sarve |
T06n1394u_002:1051: api tu sarvabhūmike na sarvadā na sarve ||
T06n1394u_002:1054: kati kliṣṭa eva na sarvatra na sarvabhūmike na sarvadā na sarve |
T06n1394u_002:1056: kati sarvatra no tu sarvebhūmike na sarvadā na sarve |
T06n1394u_002:1066: adhiṣṭhānato vā svabhāvato vā deśato vā kālato vā vyaktāvyaktato vā sakalavastvekadeśato vā |
T06n1394u_002:1069: avacchādanīyenāvaraṇena antardhāpanīyena abhibhavanīyena saṃmohanīyena ca dvābhyāṃ viprakarṣābhyāṃ deśaviprakarṣato'
T06n1394u_002:1081: yatra viṣaya audārikataro vā manāpataro vā pratyupasthito bhavati tatrābhogo bahutara utpadyate ||
T06n1394u_002:1083: yatsaṃstutataraṃ bhavati paricitataraṃ tatrābhogo bahutara utpadyate |
T06n1394u_002:1084: anyathā tvekasminnālambana ekaprakārasyaiva manaskārasya nityakālamutpattiḥ syāt |
T06n1394u_002:1085: na cāsti pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ saha dvayoḥ kṣaṇayorutpattiḥ nāpyanyonyasamanantaramanyonyotpattiḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1088: tataḥ śrotra vijñānaṃ vānyatamānyatamadvā pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1091: tābhyāṃ ca niścitaparyeṣakābhyāṃ manovijñānābhyāṃ sa viṣayo vikalpyate ||
T06n1394u_002:1092: tatra dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ kliṣṭasya vā kuśalasya vā dharmasyotpattirbhavati |
T06n1394u_002:1103: ekena padasanniśrayeṇaikasmin vastuni yāvatā kālena vijñaptirupadyate tāvadekacittaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1110: pañcānāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ samanantarotpannaṃ manaḥparyeṣakaṃ niścitaṃ vā vartamānaviṣayameva vaktavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1115: tatraiva śubhāśubhobhayaviparītalakṣaṇaṃ yat tat sparśena pratipadyate |
T06n1394u_002:1118: tatraiva samyaṅmithyobhaya viparītapratipattilakṣaṇaṃ yat taccetanayā pratipadyate |
T06n1394u_002:1119: tasmādete manaskārādayaścetanāparyavasānāścaitasāḥ sarvatra sarvabhūmike sarvadā sarve cotpadyante ||
T06n1394u_002:1131: yadīpsite vastuni tatra tatra tadanugā kartukāmatā ||
T06n1394u_002:1137: yatparīkṣye vastuni tatra tatra tadanugamupanidhyānasaṃniśritaṃ cittaikāgryaṃ ||
T06n1394u_002:1139: yatparīkṣya eva vastuni tatra tatra tadanugo dharmāṇā pravicayo yogavihitato vāyogavihitato vā naiva yogavihitato nāyogavihitataḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:1165: kathaṃ jātyā jarāyāḥ sthiteranityatāyāśca vyavasthānaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_002:1166: sarvatra vijñānasantāne sarvo bījasantānaḥ sahacaro vyavasthāpyate sati pratyaye |
T06n1394u_002:1167: pratyayavaśāttatprathamataḥ santatyānutpannapūrvo yo dharma utpadyate sā jātiḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇamityucyate ||
T06n1394u_002:1174: tānyetāni tasyaiva dharmasyāvasthābhedena catvāri lakṣaṇāni bhavanti ||
T06n1394u_002:1179: samanantarapratyayo yasya vijñānasyānantaraṃ yeṣāṃ vijñānānāmutpattiniyamaḥ sa teṣāṃ samanantarapratyayaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1191: yaduktaṃ ye hetavo ye pratyayā vijñānasyotpādāyeti |
T06n1394u_002:1199: caturvidhaṃ puṇyabhāgīyaṃ mokṣabhāgīyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīya manāsravaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1200: pañcavidhaṃ dānamayaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiṣṭaphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1201: ṣaḍvidhaṃ kuśalaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśca |
T06n1394u_002:1203: aṣṭavidhamabhivādanavandanapratyusthānāñjalikarmasaṃgṛhītaṃ subhāṣite sādhukāradānabhūtavarṇāharaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ glānopasthānasaṃgṛhītaṃ gurūṇāṃ gauraveṇopasthānasaṃgṛhītamanumodanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ parasamādāpanā saṃgṛhītaṃ pariṇāmanāsaṃgṛhītamapramāṇabhāvanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1205: daśavidhamaupadhikaṃ niraupadhikaṃ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ saṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ naivasaṃvaranāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ maulasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ śrāvakayānasaṃgṛhītaṃ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃgṛhītaṃ mahāyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1209: punardaśavidhamaṣṭāsu puṇyopapattiṣu cakravartirāja saṃvartanīyamāniñjyopagaṃ ca kuśalamityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ kuśalaprabhedaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:1215: yatkiñcicchilpaṃ ratikrīḍārthaṃ karoti na jīvikārthaṃ na karmasaṃjñayā na pratisaṃkhyāya tacchailpasthitikaṃ kliṣṭaṃ avyākṛtamanyat |
T06n1394u_002:1223: svasantānapatitaṃ parasantānapatitamabhirūpaṃ virūpaṃ samalaṃ nirmalaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1226: navavidhaṃ pratilabdhamapratilabdhaṃ pratilabdhapūrvamapratilabdhapūrvaṃ pratilabdhavihīnaṃ prahātavyamaprahātavyaṃ prahīṇamaprahīṇaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1228: ekādaśavidhamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamādhyātmikaṃ bāhyamaudārikaṃ sūkṣmaṃ hīnaṃ praṇītaṃ dūre'ntike ||
T06n1394u_002:1253: aṣṭavidhamadhivacanasaṃsparśasamprayuktaṃ pratighasaṃsparśasamprayuktaṃ gardhāśritaṃ naiṣkramyāśritaṃ sāmiṣaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1267: ṣaḍvidhaṃ pratiṣṭhāsaṃgṛhītaṃ nilayasaṃgṛhītaṃ viṣayasaṃgṛhītaṃ sattvasaṃkhyātamasattvasaṃkhyātaṃ sanirśanasapratidhaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1269: aṣṭavidhamaṣṭasu lokacitreṣu tāni punarbhūmibhāgacitraṃ parvatacitramārāmavanasarastaḍāgādicitraṃ gṛhavimānacitraṃ karmasthānacitramālekhyacitraṃ kuṭṭimakarmacitraṃ pariṣkāracitraṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1270: navavidhamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannamaudarikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yadvā dūre yadvāntike |
T06n1394u_002:1283: saptavidhaḥ strīśabdaḥ puruṣaśabdo mṛdumadhyādhimātro mṛtavihaṅgādiśabdo vātavanaspatiśabdaśca |
T06n1394u_002:1290: śrute mate vijñāte vijñātavāditā avijñāte cāvijñātavāditāryo vyavahāraḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1294: sa punarnṛtyasahagato gītasahagato vāditrasahagataḥ strīsahagataḥ puruṣasahagataśca |
T06n1394u_002:1301: pañcavidho mūlagandhaḥ sāragandhaḥ patragandhaḥ puṣpagandhaḥ phalagandhaśca |
T06n1394u_002:1310: daśavidhaḥ strīgandhaḥ puruṣagandha uccāragandhaḥ prasrāvagandhaḥ kheṭagandhaḥ śiṅghāṇagandho vasālasikāpūyaśoṇitagandho māṃsagandhaḥ saṅkaragandhaḥ kledakardamagandhaśca ||
T06n1394u_002:1322: daśavidhaḥ khādyaraso bhojanarasaḥ svādyarasaḥ peyarasaścūṣyaraso viśeṣaṇīyastarpaṇīyaḥ śamanīyaḥ śodhanīyo niṣevaṇīyaścauṣadharasaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:1333: khakkhaṭo drava uṣṇa ullaṅghanapatanasaṃsparśaḥ parāmarśasaṃsparśaḥ kāyavikārasaṃsparśaśca |
T06n1394u_002:1335: aṣṭavidhaḥ pāṇisaṃsparśo loṣṭasaṃsparśo daṇḍasaṃsparśaḥ śastrasaṃsparśaḥ śītasaṃsparśa uṣṇasaṃsparśo jighatsāsaṃsparśaḥ pipāsāsaṃsparśaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1338: laṅkārasaṃsparśo mañcapīṭhasaṃsparśaḥ kūrcabimbopadhānasaṃsparśaḥ strīsaṃsparśaḥ puruṣasaṃsparśastayoḥ paricaryāparibhogasaṃsparśaśca ||
T06n1394u_002:1343: saṃvarāsaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ rūpaṃ samādhigocarañca rūpaṃ prāptirasaṃjñāsamāpattirnirodhasamāpattirāsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ nikāyasabhāgaḥ pṛthigjanatvaṃ jātirjarā sthitiranityatā nāmakāyāḥ padakāyā vyañjanakāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ pratiniyamo yogo javo'
T06n1394u_002:1344: nukramaḥ kālo deśaḥ saṃkhyā sāmagryasāmagrī ca |
T06n1394u_002:1345: aṣṭāvasaṃskṛtavastūni ākāśamapratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatāniñjyaṃ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaśca
T06n1394u_002:1346: tānyetānyaṣṭau samānāni ṣaḍ bhavanti ṣaṭ samānānyaṣṭau bhavanti ||
T06n1394u_002:1352: caturvidho rūpī prajñaptidharmasaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpī caitasadharmasaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpī viprayuktaprajñaptisaṃgṛhītaḥ arūpyasaṃskṛtaprajñaptidharmasaṃgṛhītaśca
T06n1394u_002:1354: ṣaḍvidhaḥ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ samprayuktaviprayuktā rūpamasaṃskṛtaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_002:1361: daśavidho daśavidhārthena anubandhotpādārthena ālambanānubhavanārthena ālambananimittagrahaṇārthena ālambanābhisaṃskārārthena teṣāmeva dharmāṇāmavasthābhedārthena anityavisaṃyogārthena nityavisaṃyogārthena nityāvipītārthena sukhaduḥkhavisaṃyogārthena no tu vedayitavisaṃyogārthena vedayitavisaṃyogārthena ca |
T06n1394u_002:1363: tatra caratyākṣayādrūpāṇāṃ darśanāya caratyākṣayādrūpāṇāṃ darśanāyeti cakṣuḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1370: atra ca lokasya saṃjñā sattvo naro jīvo janturmanujo mānava iti mana iti ||
T06n1394u_002:1371: tatra tatra deśe nirūpyate rohati ceti tasmādrūpamiti vadanneva śarati vadanneva śarati tasmācchabdaḥ |
T06n1394u_002:1376: dhārayati kevalaṃ manoviṣayatvaṃ dhārayati kevalaṃ manoviṣayatvamiti dharmaḥ ||
T06n1394u_002:1377: tatraibhiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ ṣaḍvijñānakāyikaiḥ svabhāvenāśrayeṇālambanena sahāyena karmaṇā ca skandhakauśalyamapi saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_002:1381: sattvavastu upabhogavastu utpattivastu sthitivastu saṃkleśavyavadānavastu vaicitryavastu daiśikavastu deśyavastu pariṣadvastu ca ||
T06n1394u_003:33: tatra sakale kāmadhātau rūpadhātau ca prathamadhyāne dhyānāntarika samāpattyupapattikaṃ sthāpayitvā savitarkā savicārā bhūmiḥ samāpattyupapattikaṃ dhyānāntarikamavitarkāvicāramātrā bhūmiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:39: kāmyebhyo'vītarāgasyāpyavitarkāvicāra ekadā manaḥpracāro bhavatyupadeśamanaskāraviśeṣataḥ vītarāgasyāpi ca vitarkavicārebhyo vitarkavicārasamudācāro bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:43: tatrāpi prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkā savicārā bhūmiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:44: vitarkavicārasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tathatāmavalambva tatsamāpatterno tu vikalpapracārataḥ |
T06n1394u_003:51: sañjīvaḥ kālasūtraṃ saṅghāto rauravo mahārauravastāpano mahātāpano'vīciśca |
T06n1394u_003:55: ito dvātriṃśadyo janasahasraiḥ sañjīvastataḥ pareṇa catuḥsahasrayojanāntarāṇi tadanyāni draṣṭavyāni |
T06n1394u_003:63: ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ cāturmahārājakāyikāstrāyastriṃśā yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaśca devāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:64: mārabhuvanaṃ punaḥ paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu paryāpannaṃ na sthānāntaraviśiṣṭaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:65: pratyekanarakāḥ sāmantanarakāśca mahānarakaśītanarakasamanta eva na sthānāntaraviśiṣṭāḥ manuṣyeṣvapyupalamyante |
T06n1394u_003:66: tadeke pratyekanarakāḥ yathoktaṃ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena sattvamahaṃ paśyāmyādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ samprajvalitamekajvālībhūtamityevamādi |
T06n1394u_003:75: pañca śuddhāvāsabhūmayaḥ abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāśca mṛdumadhyādhimātratarādhimātratamaparibhāvitatvādvyavakīrṇabhāvitasya caturthasya dhyānasya |
T06n1394u_003:76: śuddhāvāsāṃśca samatikramaya maheśvarasthānaṃ yatra daśabhūmisthā bodhisattvādaśamyā bhūmeḥ paribhāvitatvādutpadyante ||
T06n1394u_003:91: tataḥ pareṇa sarveṣu tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣu pādapādamadhikaṃ parimāṇa draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:95: tataḥ pareṇa tadavaśiṣṭeṣu devanikāyeṣu taddiguṇamāśrayaparimāṇaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ syāpayitvā'nabhrakān |
T06n1394u_003:98: yena pragāḍhataraṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ tasya mahattara āśrayo nirvartate |
T06n1394u_003:100: yathā mahānarakeṣvevaṃ śītanarakeṣu pratyekanarakeṣu sāmantanarakeṣu pratyekanarakeṣu tiryakpreteṣu |
T06n1394u_003:105: jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ tāvanmanuṣyāṇāṃ triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena ca saṃvatsareṇāniyatamāyuṣpramāṇaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:111: yat khalu manuṣyāṇāṃ pañcāśadvarṣāṇi taccāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāmekaṃrātrindivaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:112: tena rātrindivasena triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena saṃvatsareṇa divyāni pañca varṣaśatānyāyuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:113: yatkhalu manuṣyāṇāṃ varṣaśataṃ tattu trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāmekaṃ rātrindivasaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:115: tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣvahorātreṇāpi taddiguṇena teṣāṃ devānāmāyuryāvatparanirmitavaśavarttiṣu deveṣu ||
T06n1394u_003:116: yalkhalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ kṛtsnamāyustat sañjīve mahānaraka ekaṃ rātrindivasaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:117: tena rātrindivasena triṃśadrātrakeṇa māsena dvādaśamāsakena ca saṃvatsareṇa nārakāṇi pañcavarṣaśatānyāyuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:118: yathā cāturmahārājakāyikānāmāyuṣā sañjīve mahānarake upapannānāmāyurevaṃ trayastriṃśānāmāyuṣā kālasūtropapannānāmāyuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:131: tata ūrdhvaṃ tadanyeṣu devanikāyeṣu taddviguṇataddviguṇamāyuḥ sthāpayitvānabhrakān |
T06n1394u_003:138: astyantare kālakriyā tatra manuṣyeṣu tiryakpreteṣu ca kiṭṭālakāyāḥ santiṣṭhante |
T06n1394u_003:139: deveṣu narakeṣu ca sahaiva vijñānena akiṭṭakāyāḥ santiṣṭhante ||
T06n1394u_003:145: tatra narakeṣu yadbhūyasā sattvāḥ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti tiryakṣvanyonyabhakṣaṇaduḥkhaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:149: tatra sañjīve mahānarake evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
T06n1394u_003:150: tatra te sattvā anyonyaṃ saṅgamya karmādhipatyasambhūtairvividhaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ kramasamutpannairanyonyaṃ vipraghātikāṃ kurvanto niśceṣṭāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapatanti |
T06n1394u_003:151: tata ākāśācchabdo niścarati sañjīvantu hanta sattvā iti |
T06n1394u_003:152: tataḥ punaste sattvā vyutthāya tenaiva prakāreṇānyonyavipraghātikāṃ kurvanti |
T06n1394u_003:153: tato nidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣīṇaṃ vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:154: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ sañjīva ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:156: tatra te sattvāstatparyāpannairyātanāpuruṣaiḥ kālakena sūtreṇa māpyante |
T06n1394u_003:158: māpitāśca tathā tathā khanyante takṣyante sampratakṣyante |
T06n1394u_003:159: tato nidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:160: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ kālasūtra ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:161: tatra saṅghāte mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
T06n1394u_003:162: tatra te sattvā yadānyonyamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣiptāḥ saṅghātamāpannā bhavanti tadā tatparyāpannairyātanāpuruṣairdvayorajamukhayorāyasayormahāparvatayorvivaramanupraveśyante
T06n1394u_003:164: teṣāṃ prapīḍitānāṃ sarvatomukhaṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
T06n1394u_003:166: punaḥ saṅghātamāpannā āyase mahāyantre prakṣipya prapīḍyante yathekṣukṣodaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:167: teṣāṃ tatra prapīḍyamānānāṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
T06n1394u_003:168: punaḥ saṅghātamāpannānāmupariṣṭādāyasī mahāśilā pratatati yā tānsattvānayomayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ sañchindati sambhindati saṅkaṭayati sampradālayati
T06n1394u_003:169: teṣāṃ tatra tatra sañchidyamānānāṃ sambhidyamānānāṃ saṅkuṭyamānānāṃ sampradālyamānānāṃ rudhiranadyaḥ prasravanti pragharanti |
T06n1394u_003:170: tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:171: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ saṅghāta ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:172: tatra raurave mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
T06n1394u_003:173: tatra te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇa āyasamagāraṃ praviśanti |
T06n1394u_003:174: teṣāṃ tatra praviṣṭānāmagnirmucyate yatasta ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ samprajvalitā dhyāyanti |
T06n1394u_003:175: te tatra ruvantyārtasvaraṃ krandante tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:176: tasmācca punaḥ sa narako raurava ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:179: gāraḥ sa tatrāgāra eva vijñātavyaḥ sagarbhastu |
T06n1394u_003:180: tasmācca punaḥ sa narako mahāraurava ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:181: tatra tapane mahānaraka evaṃrūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti bāhulyena |
T06n1394u_003:182: tatparyāpannā yātanāpuruṣāstānsattvānanekayojanāyāṃ kaphalyāṃ prakṣipya taptāyāṃ prataptāyāṃ samprajvalitāyāmāvartayanti parivartayanti tāpayanti santāpayanti tadyathā matsyān |
T06n1394u_003:184: sa ca śalyaḥ pṛṣṭhāntena praviśya śirasā nirgacchatyādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:185: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mukhādakṣitārakābhyo nāsikāvilebhyaḥ sarvaromakūpebhyo jvālā nirgacchanti |
T06n1394u_003:186: punarayomayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ taptāyāṃ santaptāyāṃ prajvalitāyāmuttānakānsthāpayitvāvamūrdhakān vā taptaiḥ santaptaiḥ samprajvalitairayoghanaistāḍayanti santāḍayanti sandālayanti tadyathā nāma māṃsabilvaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:187: tatonidānaṃ ca dīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:195: lauhapatraiśca taptaiḥ santaptaiḥ samprajvalitaiḥ sarvataḥ kāyaṃ pariveṣṭayanti punarayomayyāṃ mahatyāṃ lohyāṃ kvathitakṣārapūrṇāyāmādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ samprajvalitāyāṃ te sattvā ūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ prakṣipyante |
T06n1394u_003:198: pi gacchantastiryagapi gacchanto yataśca saṅkīrṇatvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitā bhavantyasthiśaṅkalāmātrāvaśiṣṭāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:203: yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:204: tasmācca punaḥ sa narakaḥ pratāpana ityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:205: tatrāvīcau mahānaraka evaṃ rūpaṃ kāraṇāduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:206: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśyanekayojanaśatāyāḥ pṛthivyā ādīptāyāḥ pradīptāyāḥ samprajvalitāyā agnijvālāvega āgacchati yatasteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tvacaṃ bhittvā māṃsaṃ bhittvā snāyuṃ chittvāsthi bhittvāsthimajjānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:209: yathā pūrvasyā diśa evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimāyā uttarasyā diśaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:212: gniskandhe te tatra vīcimapi nāsādayanti duḥkhānāṃ vedanānāṃ nānyatra ārtasvaraṃ krandanto vijñāyante sattvā iti |
T06n1394u_003:216: sā tathā vitatā vigatavalikā vigatapuṭikā ca tadyathārṣabhaṃ carma |
T06n1394u_003:217: punastasyāmevāyomayyāṃ pṛthivyāmuttānakānsthāpayitvāyomayena viṣkambhanena mukhaṃ viṣkambhayitvā dīptāḥ pradīptāḥ samprajvalitāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:218: ayoguḍā mukheṣu kṣipyante ye teṣāṃ mukhamapi dahanti kaṇṭhamapyantramapi dagdhvā ca punaradhobhāgena nirgacchanti |
T06n1394u_003:220: tacca mukhamapi dagdhvā kaṇṭhamapyantramapi dagdhvādhobhāgena dagdhvādhobhāgena pragharati |
T06n1394u_003:222: tatonidānaṃ punardīrghakālaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti yāvattatpāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:226: na ca punareṣu mahānarakeṣu tadanyāni vicitrākārāṇi bahūni kāraṇāni nopalabhyante ||
T06n1394u_003:228: sarva ete mahānarakāścaturdiśaṃ catuṣkandhāścaturdvārā āyasaiḥ prākāraiḥ parivāritāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:229: tatra ca caturdiśaṃ caturbhirdvārai rnirgatyaikaikasmindvāre catvāra utsadā bhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:235: tatra ca kuṇape gūthamṛttike kīṭāḥ prāṇino ye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tvacamapi cchidrayanti māṃsamapi snāyvasthyapi bhindanti tato'
T06n1394u_003:237: tasya khalu kuṇapasya gūthamṛttikasya samanantaraṃ sannihitameva kṣuradhārācitaḥ patho yaṃ te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇo'
T06n1394u_003:239: tatra teṣāṃ nikṣipte pāde sañchidyate tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:241: tasya khalu kṣuradhārācitasya pathaḥ samanantaraṃ sannihitamevāsipatravanaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:243: tatra teṣāmadhastānniṣaṇṇānāṃ vṛkṣādasayaḥ patanti ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni cchindrayanti vyatibhindanti |
T06n1394u_003:244: teṣāṃ tatra patitānāṃ śyāmaśabalā nāmaśvāna āgatya pṛṣṭhīvaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti ||
T06n1394u_003:245: tasya khalvasipatravanasya samanantaraṃ sannihitamevāyaḥśālmalīvanaṃ yatte sattvā layanagaveṣiṇo'
T06n1394u_003:248: avataratāmurdhvībhavanti kaṇṭakā ye teṣāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni cchidrayanti vyatibhindanti |
T06n1394u_003:249: tatra cāyastuṇḍānāma vāyasā ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmaṃse vā śirasi vābhinipatyabhittvākṣitārakā utpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayanti ||
T06n1394u_003:250: tasya khalvayaḥśālmalīvanasya samanantaraṃ sannihitameva vaitaraṇī nadī pūrṇā kvathitasya kṣārodakasya yatra te sattvā layanagaveṣiṇaḥ prapatanti
T06n1394u_003:253: tadyathā nāma mudgā vā māṣā kolā vā kulatthā vodārāgnisampradīptodakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ prakṣiptāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:254: tasyāḥ khalu nadyā ubhayatastīre daṇḍahastā baḍiśahastā jālahastā sattvā vyavasthitā ye teṣāṃ sattvānāmudgantumapi na prayacchanti vaḍiśoddhārikayā vā jāloddhārikayā vā punaruddhṛtyodārāgnisantaptāyāṃ bhūmāvuttānakānpratiṣṭhāpya pṛcchanti habhmoḥ sattvāḥ kimicchatha |
T06n1394u_003:256: na jānīmo vayamapi na paśyāmaḥ apitu bubhukṣitāḥ smaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:257: tataste sattvāsteṣāṃ sattvānāmayomayena viṣkambhanena mukhaṃ viṣkambhayitvāyoguḍānudārāgnisantaptānāsye prakṣipanti pūrvavat |
T06n1394u_003:261: yāvattannarakavedanīyaṃ pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma sarveṇa sarvaṃ na parikṣīṇaṃ bhavati vyantīkṛtaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:262: tatra yaśca kṣuradhārācitaḥ patho yaccāsipatravanaṃ yaccāyaḥśālmalīvanaṃ yā ca vaitaraṇī nadī ayameka utsada iti kṛtvā catvāra utsadā bhavanti
T06n1394u_003:263: tatra śītanarakeṣūpapannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śītaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:264: arbudopapannāḥ sattvāstadbhūmikenodāreṇa śītena spṛṣṭā arbudavatsarvāśrayeṇa saṅkocamāpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:271: tatrāṭaṭo hahavo huhuvo vāgabhilāpakṛtametatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nāmavyavasthānaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:272: utpale punaḥ śītanarake tadbhūmikenodāreṇa śītena spṛṣṭā vyānīlāyamānāḥ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:276: nīlatāṃ samatikramya vyālohitāyamānā daśadhā vā bhūyo vā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:280: bhṛśataraṃ vyālohitāyamānā śatadhā vā bhūyo vā tvacāṃ sphoṭamāpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:282: pratyekanarakeṣu punarutpannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekamātmabhāveṣu svakarmopanipāti duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:291: pretāḥ puna samāsatastrividhā bahirbhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇā adhyātmaṃ bhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇā bhojanapānakṛtāvaraṇāśca ||
T06n1394u_003:294: te ca bhavanti kṣutpipāsāyogātsaṃśuṣkatvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitā dagdhasthūṇākṛtayaḥ keśānukārairmukhaiḥ kṣutpipāsāparigatavadanāḥ saṃśuṣkamukhā lelihamānajihvāḥ sambhrāntavadanāstena tenānvāhiṇḍantyutsasarastaḍāgeṣu |
T06n1394u_003:295: tatra cāparairasihastaiḥ pāśahastaistomarahastaiḥ sattvaistebhya utsasarastaḍāgebhyo nivāryante |
T06n1394u_003:301: tathā hi te svayameva parairakṛtāvaraṇā labdhvāpi bhojanapānaṃ na śaknuvanti bhoktuṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:304: santi jvālāmālino nāma pretā yeṣāṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ pītaṃ pītaṃ sarvamavadahyate yenaiṣāṃ kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ na kadācidapaiti ||
T06n1394u_003:305: santi ca pretā avaskarabhakṣā nāma ya ekatye'
T06n1394u_003:307: yadvāśuci durgandhamāmagandhaṃ pratikūlaṃ pratikruṣṭaṃ tacchaknuvanti bhakṣayituṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:309: yattu bhavati śuci vā praṇītaṃ vā tanna śaknuvanti bhoktuṃ vā pātuṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:311: tatra manuṣyeṣūpapannāḥ sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ vighātaduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:318: tathā hi narakeṣu maraṇameva sukhaṃ manyate |
T06n1394u_003:328: sva āsane devo vā devaputro vā na ramate ||
T06n1394u_003:329: tasya tasminsamaye pariṣaṇḍe parigatasya tā apsarasastadanyairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ paricaranti |
T06n1394u_003:330: sa tā dṛṣṭvā tato nidānaṃ mahad duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
T06n1394u_003:334: tatra yo vistīrṇatareṇa puṇyaskandhena samanvāgato bhavati tasya divyāḥ pañca kāmaguṇā udāratarāḥ prādurbhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:335: tatra tadanyeṣāṃ nikṛṣṭapuṇyatarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā madgubhāvaḥ santiṣṭhate |
T06n1394u_003:339: tathā hi devāsure saṃgrāme pratyupasthite anyonyaṃ devā asurāśca prativiruddhāścaturvidhānyasrāṇyādāya suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni sphaṭikamayāni vaidūryamayāni saṃgrāme saṃgrāmayanti |
T06n1394u_003:340: tatra ca devānāṃ vāsurāṇāṃ vā aṅgapratyaṅgacchedo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:344: yadā tu śiraśchinnaṃ bhavati tadā vadhamanuprāpnuvanti |
T06n1394u_003:345: tata ekadā devāḥ parājīyante ekadā asurāḥ yadbhūyasā tu devā jayanti prabhūtabalatayā |
T06n1394u_003:346: tayorye parājīyante teṣāṃ sva puraṃ praviṣṭānāṃ nirvṛtiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:350: asurāścaturvidhāyāḥ sudhāyā arthe devaiḥ sārdhaṃ prativiruddhāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:353: ato na tathā śukladharmāṇāṃ bhājanabhūtāstadyathā devāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:355: te surā eva samānā na suradharmamādāya vartante |
T06n1394u_003:357: balavattaraśca devaputraḥ kupitaḥ samāno durbalataraṃ devaputraṃ svasmādbhavanātpracyāvayati pravāsayati |
T06n1394u_003:358: tasmāddevāstrividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti cyavanapatanaduḥkhaṃ madgubhāvaduḥkhaṃ chedanabhedanavadhapravāsanaduḥkhaṃ ca ||
T06n1394u_003:360: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nāsti sarvaśa eva tadduḥkhaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:361: duḥkhāyā vedanāyā yasmātte sattvā na bhājanabhūtāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:369: mahardhikeṣu preteṣu manuṣyeṣu ca bahirmukhanirgatamupakaraṇasukhaṃ duḥkhavyatikīrṇavyatimiśramupalabhyate ||
T06n1394u_003:373: tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:374: kathaṃrūpamasya tasminsamaye cakraratnaṃ sambhavatīti yathāsūtrameva saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvo vaktavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:380: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakavijitāni samanuśāsata dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
T06n1394u_003:381: mā ca vo'dharmacāriṇo viṣamacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso roceta |
T06n1394u_003:385: devā punarmahatīṃ svargabhūmiṃ pratyanubhavanti varṇavanto ratibahulāḥ sveṣu vimāneṣu cirasthitayaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:392: nānābhaktivicitritāni kūṭāgāraramaṇīyāni harmya ramaṇīyakāni harmyaramaṇīyakāni vedikāramaṇīyakāni jālavātāyanaramaṇīyakāni nānāmaṇipratyarpitānyāmuktāvabhāsāni samantato bhānti ||
T06n1394u_003:393: tathā bhojanavṛkṣā yato bhojanaṃ caturvidhā sudhā nirvartate |
T06n1394u_003:395: evaṃ pānavṛkṣā yato madhumādhavaṃ pānaṃ nirvartate |
T06n1394u_003:396: yānavṛkṣā yato vicitrāṇi yānāni nirvartante rathayugmaśivikāprabhṛtīni ||
T06n1394u_003:397: vastravṛkṣā yato vividhāni vastrāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sthūlāni suśuklāni nānāvidharaṅgāṇi suvarṇa bhaktivicitritāni prādurbhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:398: alaṅkāravṛkṣā yato vividhā alaṅkārā nirvartante maṇayaḥ keyūrāḥ kuṇḍalāni harṣāḥ kaṭakā hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni |
T06n1394u_003:400: gandhadhūpamālyavṛkṣā yato vicitrā gandhā vividhā dhūpā vividhāni mālyāni |
T06n1394u_003:408: tasya cādhastāddevāstrayastriṃśāścaturo vārṣikānmāsān divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍanti ||
T06n1394u_003:409: tathā hāsyanṛtyagītavāditavṛkṣā yato hāsyanṛtya gītavāditānāṃ vicitrāṇi bhājanāni nirvartante ||
T06n1394u_003:410: tathā bhāṇḍopaskaravṛkṣā yato vicitrā bhāṇḍopaskarā nirvartante |
T06n1394u_003:411: tadyathā bhojanabhāṇḍopaskaraḥ pānabhāṇḍopaskaraḥ śayanāsanabhāṇḍopaskara ityevambhāgīyo bhāṇḍopaskaraḥ |
T06n1394u_003:412: teṣāṃ yathepsitaṃ yathākarma tānyupakaraṇānyupabhoktukāmānāṃ haste prādurbhavanti ||
T06n1394u_003:414: uttareṣu punaḥ kuruṣvevaṃrūpā eva vṛkṣā kalpavṛkṣā ityucyante |
T06n1394u_003:415: yataste vṛkṣādeva svayaṃ gṛhṇanti no tu cintitaṃ haste santiṣṭate |
T06n1394u_003:417: amamāśca te sattvā aparigrahā niyataṃ ca viśeṣagāminaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:418: tatra ca śakrasya devendrasya sarvaśreṣṭho vaijayantaḥ prāsādo yatraikaviṃśatirniryūha śataṃ |
T06n1394u_003:423: sarvaśca bhūmibhāgo devānāṃ pāṇitalasamo notkūlanikūlaḥ sparśakṣamaśca |
T06n1394u_003:431: catvāri ca caturdiśaṃ dvārāṇi māpitānyabhirūpāṇi darśanīyāni prāsādikāni vicitrābhirūpaprabhūtapakṣādhiṣṭhitāni |
T06n1394u_003:433: tadyathā caitrarathaṃ pāruṣakaṃ miśrakaṃ nandanavanaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:435: bhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ uttarapūrveṇa ca devapūryāḥ sudharmā devasabhā yatra devāḥ praviśyārthaṃ cintayanti tulayantyupaparīkṣante |
T06n1394u_003:436: tasya ca sāmantakena pāṇḍukambalaśilā śvetābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā |
T06n1394u_003:442: te rātriṃ divasānyekāntasukhasaumanasyasamarpitā divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ ramamāṇā ekāntapramādavaśagā nṛtyaśabdairgītaśabdairvāditaśabdairnaṭanartakahāsakalāsakaśabdaiḥ
T06n1394u_003:448: na ca teṣāṃ vyādhirna paribhedo na jaropalabhyate |
T06n1394u_003:452: rūpāvacarā devāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikā vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
T06n1394u_003:458: api khalu ṣaḍbhirviśeṣairduḥkhaviśeṣo veditavyaḥ sukhaviśeṣo vā |
T06n1394u_003:459: parimāṇaviśeṣeṇa saukumāryaviśeṣeṇa pratyayaviśeṣeṇa kālaviśeṣeṇa cittaviśeṣeṇa āśrayaviśeṣeṇa ca |
T06n1394u_003:460: yathā yathā sukumārataraḥ kāyo bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:461: yathā yathā sukumāratara āśrayo bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:462: yathā yathā pratyayāstīvratarāḥ pracuratarā vicitratarā bhavanti tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:463: yathā yathā kālo dīrghataro nirantaraśca bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:464: yathā yathā pratisaṃkhyānabalikataraṃ cittaṃ bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:465: yathā yathāśrayo duḥkhabhājanabhūtataro bhavati tathā tathā duḥkhaviśeṣo bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:472: tadyathā yānaṃ vastramalaṅkāro hāsyanṛtyagītavāditaṃ gandha mālyavilepanaṃ vicitrapraṇītabhāṇḍopaskaratā ālokastrīpuruṣaparicaryā kośasannidhiśca
T06n1394u_003:474: tadyathā ānanda vyāyāmaḥ śilācakravyāyāmo gadācakravyāyāma ityevaṃbhāgīyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:478: tatrārya dhanajaṃ sukhaṃ yatsaptāryāṇi dhanāni pratītyotpadyate śraddhādhanaṃ śīladhanaṃ hrīdhanamapatrāpyadhanaṃ śrutadhanaṃ tyāgadhanaṃ prajñādhanaṃ
T06n1394u_003:493: punaranāryadhanajaṃ parairācchedyaṃ rājabhirvā caurairvā pratyarthibhirvāgninā vodakena vā |
T06n1394u_003:508: api khalu pañcabhirākārairbāhyātkāmināṃ kāmaparibhogādāryāṇāṃ prajñājīvināṃ dharmaparibhogo viśiṣyate yenāryaḥ prajñājīvyanuttarāṃ prajñājīvikāṃ
T06n1394u_003:512: punaraparaṃ kāmināṃ kāmopabhogasya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
T06n1394u_003:515: na tu tathāryaprajñājīvināṃ dharmopabhogaḥ punaraparaṃ kāmināṃ kāmopabhoge vartamānānāṃ tadeva vastvekatyānāṃ saumanasyasthānīyaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:520: punaraparaṃ ito bāhyānāṃ saṃtyaktakāmānāṃ prajñājīvināṃ teṣu teṣu dṛṣṭigateṣu svavikalpasamutthāpiteṣu mithyādhimuktipadeṣu sthāmaśaḥ parāmṛśyābhiniviṣṭacetasāṃ
T06n1394u_003:524: punaraparaṃ dharmopabhogināṃ tadvītarāgāṇāṃ ca laukikānāmapi pariniṣpannaṃ kāmasukhaṃ vivekasukhaṃ ca bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:525: mārapratyarthikānugataṃ ca māyopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamaṃ pratibimbopamaṃ marīcikopamaṃ stapnopamaṃ māyākṛtālaṅkāropamaṃ ca yatsukhaṃ tad bālāḥ kāmopabhogino laukikavītarāgāśconmattakopamāḥ pratiniṣevante |
T06n1394u_003:529: api khalu kathaṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśrayo draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:538: ata eva bhagavatā sukhā vedanāpi pariṇāmaduḥkhatayā duḥkhetyuktā |
T06n1394u_003:544: yatpunarbhagavatā saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasukhaṃ sukhānāmagratvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tadvihārasukhamabhisandhāya no tu vedayitasukhaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:545: yadapyuktaṃ trīṇi sukhāni rāgavirāgo dveṣavirāgo mohavirāga iti |
T06n1394u_003:550: tadyathā jātānāṃ bhūtānāṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ caturbhirāhārairyāvadāyuḥsthitirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:551: yāvatā tatra tribhirāhāraiḥ sparśena manaḥsañcetanayā na sarveṣāṃ traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:553: yāvatā tatra narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sūkṣmaḥ kāvaḍīkārāhāragarbho vāyurvāti |
T06n1394u_003:555: yāvatā tiraścāṃ pretānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ caudārika āhāro yaṃ te kavaḍīkṛtya bhakṣayanti |
T06n1394u_003:556: ya eva punaḥ sūkṣmakalalādigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ devānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ |
T06n1394u_003:558: teṣāṃ bhuktamātra eva kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ kāye sarvāṅgeṣvanuvisarañjarāmāpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:561: tatrāyaṃ maithunaparibhogo nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāsti |
T06n1394u_003:562: tathā hi te tīvraṃ ca duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti vicitrañca dīrghaṃ ca nirantaraṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:563: tataśca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ strīṣu strīcchanda eva notpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:564: strīṇāṃ ca puruṣe puruṣacchanda eva notpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:567: te cānyo'nyaṃ striyaśca puruṣāśca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:572: yathā cāturmahārājakāyikānāmevaṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāmanyonyaṃ pariṣvajanamātrakeṇa dāho vigacchati |
T06n1394u_003:575: paranirmitavaśavartināmanyonyaṃ cakṣuṣā cakṣurupanidhyāya nirīkṣitamātrakeṇa dāho vigacchati |
T06n1394u_003:580: uttareṣu kuruṣvamamatvādaparigrahatvātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nāsti dāraparigraho nāvāhavivāhaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:581: yathā triṣu dvīpeṣvevaṃ pretanarakeṣu kāmāvacareṣu ca deveṣu |
T06n1394u_003:582: sthāpayitvā nirmāṇaratīnparanirmitavaśavartinaśca devān kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu nāpsarasāṃ garbhaḥ santiṣṭhate |
T06n1394u_003:583: cāturmahārājakāyikānāmaṃsevotsaṅge vā mātāpitroḥ pañcavarṣako vā dāraka aupapādukaḥ sambhavati trāyastriṃśakānāṃ ṣaḍvarṣako vā yāmānāṃ saptavarṣako vā tuṣitānāmaṣṭavarṣako vā nirmāṇaratīnāṃ navavarṣako vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ daśavarṣako vā dārako'
T06n1394u_003:588: santi sattvāḥ pratyupasthitakāmā ye pratyupasthitaiḥ kāmairaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
T06n1394u_003:593: santi sattvā nirmitakāmā ye nirmāya nirmāya kāmākāmānaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
T06n1394u_003:596: teṣāṃ ca nirmāṇaratīnāṃ devānāmātmanimittaṃ kāmanirmāṇaṃ samṛdhyati |
T06n1394u_003:600: santi sattvā paranirmitakāmā ye paranirmitairapi kāmairaiśvaryaṃ vaśe vartayanti |
T06n1394u_003:602: tathā hi teṣāṃ devānāmātmanimittamapi nirmāṇaṃ samṛdhyati paranimittamapi |
T06n1394u_003:606: na tu te paranirmitāneva kāmānniṣevanti api tu svanirmitānapi |
T06n1394u_003:610: santi sattvā ye vivekajena prītisukhena kāmamabhiṣvandayanti |
T06n1394u_003:613: santi sattvā ye samādhijena prītisukhena kāmamabhiṣyandayanti |
T06n1394u_003:614: tadyathā devā dvitīyadhyānabhūmikāḥ iyaṃ dvitīyā sukhopapattiḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:615: santi sattvā ye niṣprītikena sukhena kāmamabhiṣyandayanti tadyathā devāstṛtīyadhyānabhūmikāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:620: āha | tisra imā eṣaṇāḥ kāmaiṣaṇā bhavaiṣaṇā brahmacaryeṣaṇā ca |
T06n1394u_003:621: tatra ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāmaiṣaṇāmāpadyante sarve te tisṛṇāṃ kāmopapattīnāmarthe |
T06n1394u_003:623: tatra ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavaiṣaṇāmāpadyante sukhanimittaṃ sarve te yadbhūyasā sukhakāmatayā tisṛṇāṃ sukhopapattīnāmarthe |
T06n1394u_003:627: ye kecicchramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā brahmacaryeṣaṇāmāpadyante sarve te'
T06n1394u_003:629: apyeke mithyābrahmacaryaiṣaṇāmāpadyanta āniñjasyārtha ākāśānantyāyatanasya vijñānānantyāyatanasyākiñcanyāyatanasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasyārthe mithyāvimokṣataḥ parikalpitasya |
T06n1394u_003:641: teṣāṃ tathā viharatāṃ smṛtiḥ pramuṣyate smṛtipramoṣātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmātsthānāccyutirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:642: tathā santi manaḥpradūṣikā nāma devā ye tasminsamaye'
T06n1394u_003:644: teṣāṃ tathā prekṣamāṇānāmanyonyaṃ manāṃsipraduṣyanti manaḥpradoṣātteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmātsthānāccyutirbhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:646: tadyathā kalalagateṣu ghanagateṣu peśīgateṣvarbudagateṣu mātuḥ kukṣigateṣu sattveṣu ||
T06n1394u_003:649: astyātmabhāvapratilambho yatra naivātmasañcetanā krāmati na parasañcetanā |
T06n1394u_003:650: tadyathā rūpyārūppāvacareṣu deveṣu nārakeṣu narakopameṣu preteṣu tathāgatadūte caramabhavike maitrīsamāpanne nirodhasamāpanne'
T06n1394u_003:656: yatpūrvaṃ yacca pratiṣṭhāya yacca saṅgamya yasya dharmasya prāptirvā siddhirvā niṣpattirvā kriyā vā sa tasya heturityucyate |
T06n1394u_003:657: kiṃpūrvā ki pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasyotpattirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:658: svabījapūrvā bījāśrayaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyamāśrayaṃ pratirūpiṇamarūpiṇaṃ vā karma ca pratiṣṭhāya sahāyamālambanaṃ ca saṅgamya kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktānāmārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāmapratisaṃyuktānāmutpāditā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:660: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya prāptirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:661: śrāvakapratyekabuddhatathāgatagotrapūrvādhyātmāṅgabalaṃ pratiṣṭhāya bāhyāṅgabalaṃ saṅgamya kleśavisaṃyogasya nirvāṇasya prāptirbhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:677: tatra kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya siddhirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:678: jñeyādhimuktirucipūrvā pratijñāhetūdāharaṇaṃ pratiṣṭhāya prativādinamavilomāṃ ca pariṣadaṃ saṅgamya sādhyasyārthasya siddhirbhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:679: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya niṣpattirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:680: śilpajñānapūrvā tadanugaṃ vyavasāyaṃ pratiṣṭhāya śilpakarmasthānīyaṃ bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ tasya tasya śilpakarmasthānasya siddhirbhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:681: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya sthitirbhavati tṛṣṇāpūrvā punahārasthitikarmāśrayaṃ pratiṣṭhāya catura āhārānsaṅgamya bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:683: kiṃpūrvā kiṃ pratiṣṭhāya kiṃ saṅgamya kasya dharmasya kriyā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:684: svabījapūrvotpattiṃ pratiṣṭhāyotpattipratyayaṃ saṅgamya sakarmakasya dharmasya svakriyā prajñāyate svakarmakaraṇaṃ tadyathā cakṣuṣo darśanaṃ
T06n1394u_003:689: vāyuḥ śoṣayatītyevaṃbhāgīyaṃ bāhyānāmapi bhāvānāṃ svakasvakaṃ karma veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:738: kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu dharmeṣu rūpapratisaṃyukteṣvārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu apratisaṃyukteṣu nāmavyavasthānapūrvā saṃjñā pravartate |
T06n1394u_003:745: yaḥ kāmapratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya kāmānāṃ lābhaṃ paryeṣate saṃnicayaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate ||
T06n1394u_003:746: yo rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
T06n1394u_003:747: yo vā pratisaṃyuktena sukhenārthī bhavati sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
T06n1394u_003:748: yo vā punarduḥkhenānarthī sa tadapekṣya tatpratyayānāṃ parihāraṃ tatprahāṇapratyayānāṃ lābhaṃ vā pratiniṣevaṇaṃ vā paryeṣate |
T06n1394u_003:765: tatra śliṣṭanirodhaṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānamadhiṣṭhāya tathā viṣayamindriyaṃ kriyāṃ puruṣakāraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ ca hetvadhiṣṭhānamadhiṣṭhāya parigrahahetuḥ prajñāpyate |
T06n1394u_003:770: yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktānāmevaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktānāmārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ tattvadarśanaparigṛhītā vā punastadanyeṣāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:771: tasmācchiṣṭanirodhaṃ viṣayamindriyaṃ kriyāṃ puruṣakāraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya parigrahahetuḥ prajñāpyate ||
T06n1394u_003:777: tadanukūlatayā yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktā evaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktā rūpapratisaṃyuktānkuśalāndharmān vaiśeṣikānārūpyapratisaṃyuktānapratisaṃyuktān
T06n1394u_003:782: tadyathā kāmarāgo dveṣaṃ mohaṃ mānaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ vicikitsāṃ kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:783: yathā kāmarāgau evaṃ dveṣo moho māno dṛṣṭirvicikitsā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:787: tadyathā kavaḍīkāra āhāro bhūtānāṃ sattvānāṃ sthitaye yāpanāyā ojaso balasya puṣṭeścāvāhakastadanukūlatayā |
T06n1394u_003:793: yathā kāmapratisaṃyuktā evaṃ rūpapratisaṃyuktā ārūpyapratisaṃyuktā apratisaṃyuktāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:805: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇā mutpattaye sa cedantarāyaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati notpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:807: yathotpattaya evaṃ prāptaye siddhaye niṣpattaye kriyāyai |
T06n1394u_003:812: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ dharmāṇāmutpattaye sa cedantarāyaḥ pratyupasthito bhavati bhavatyeṣāmutpādaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:820: tatra vāsanāmānukūlyaṃ ca hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya vipākaphalaṃ niṣyandaphalaṃ ca prajñāpyate |
T06n1394u_003:821: tattvadarśanaṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya visaṃyogaphalaṃ prajñāpyate |
T06n1394u_003:822: puruṣakāraṃ hetvadhiṣṭhānaṃ pratyayādhiṣṭhānaṃ cādhiṣṭhāya puruṣakāraphalaṃ prajñāpyate |
T06n1394u_003:861: nityasya heturbhavanparabhāvasya heturbhavati uttarasya ca svabhāvasya |
T06n1394u_003:862: no tu tatkṣaṇikasya parasyottarasya ca svabhāvasya heturbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:866: pratyayāntaramapi labdhvā bhavan vikāramāpadyamāno bhavati na vikāramanāpannaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:869: śaktiyuktādapi bhavannanurūpānukūlādbhavati nānanurūpānanukūlādityebhiḥ saptabhirākārairhetunā yathāyogaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:901: lokottarajñānamapekṣya tadanye sarve traidhātukāvacarāścittacaitasikā dharmā vikalpena na vitarkavicāraḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:903: nārakāṇāṃ vitarkavicārāḥ kimākārāḥ pravartante kiṃsparśāḥ kiṃsamudīritāḥ kiṃsamprayuktāḥ kiṃprārthanāḥ kiṃkarmakāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:904: yathā nārakāṇāmevaṃ tiraścāṃ pretānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikānāṃ devānāṃ vitarkavicārāḥ kimākārāḥ kiṃsparśāḥ kiṃsamudīritāḥ kiṃsamprayuktāḥ kiṃprārthanāḥ kiṃkarmakāśca pravartante |
T06n1394u_003:905: tatra nārakāṇāṃ vitarkavicārā ekāntena dainyākārā aniṣṭaviṣayasaṃsparśā duḥkhasamudīritā daurmanasyasamprayuktā duḥkhavimokṣaprārthanāścittasaṃkṣobhakarmakāśca pravartante ||
T06n1394u_003:906: yathā nārakāṇāmevaṃ duḥkhitānāṃ pretānāṃ tiraścāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ pretasahagatikānāṃ vitarkavicārā bāhulyena dainyākārā alpamodākārāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:911: devānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ vitarkavicārā bāhulyenāmodākārā alpaṃ dainyākārāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:933: adhiṣṭhānaṃ ca vastu ca eṣaṇā paribhogatā |
T06n1394u_003:934: pratipattiśca bodhī dve tathā pāramitena ca ||
T06n1394u_003:957: yathāpi sa eva tathā bhogānparyeṣyāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte'
T06n1394u_003:965: yathāpīhaikatyo mātṛjñaḥ pitṛjñaḥ śrāmaṇyo bāhmaṇyaḥ kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyako'
T06n1394u_003:1030: eṣa khalu caturṣvanuvṛttyupagameṣu catvāri sthānāni niścitya pañcavidhaṃ phalaṃ veditavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1076: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo brāhmaṇo vā evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī nityaṃ nityakālaṃ dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ vidyata eva hetau phalamiti tadyathā vārṣagaṇyaḥ
T06n1394u_003:1077: te punaḥ kena kāraṇena hetau phalaṃ paśyanti vyavasthāpayanti paridīpayanti |
T06n1394u_003:1082: yathā sa eva śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tārkiko bhavati mīmāṃsakastarkaparyāpannāyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ svayaṃ prātibhānikyāṃ pārthagjanikyāṃ mīmāṃsānucaritāyāṃ
T06n1394u_003:1084: yebhyo bhāvebhyo ye bhāvā utpadyante te teṣāṃ kāraṇatvena prasiddhāḥ prajñāpyante ca |
T06n1394u_003:1086: tasya ca phalasyārthe phalārthibhirapyādīyante na tadanye |
T06n1394u_003:1087: ta eva ca teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu viniyujyante na tadanye |
T06n1394u_003:1090: anyathā hi sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇatvena vyavasthāpyeta |
T06n1394u_003:1094: prajñaptitaścopādānataśca kṛtyaviniyogataścotpattitaśca nityakālaṃ hetau phalaṃ paśyanti ||
T06n1394u_003:1095: sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ kaccidicchasi hetulakṣaṇaṃ phalalakṣaṇaṃ hetorvā punaḥ phalalakṣaṇamabhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā bhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1098: phalaniyama iti nirviśiṣṭatvāddhetuphalayorhetau phalaṃ vidyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1104: tena hetau phalamutpadyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1107: tatra vidyamānalakṣaṇo dharmo vidyamānalakṣaṇe dharme pañcākāreṇa lakṣaṇena veditavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1117: tasmādapi nityakālaṃ dhruvakālaṃ vidyata eva hetau phalamiti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1125: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī |
T06n1394u_003:1127: tadyathā sa eva hetuphalasadvādī śabdalakṣaṇavādī ca ||
T06n1394u_003:1128: kena kāraṇena hetuphalasadvādī hetau vidyamānasya phalasyābhivyakti paśyati |
T06n1394u_003:1132: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ svayameva tārkiko bhavati mīmāṃsaka iti |
T06n1394u_003:1136: na ca na kriyate prayatnaḥ phalaniṣpattaye |
T06n1394u_003:1154: sacedvidyamānatāvaraṇakāraṇaṃ tena na nityakālamabhivyaktirvidyamānasyeti na yujyate heturapi vidyate |
T06n1394u_003:1156: tena sa eva heturbhavatyekasya sa eva phalaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1158: tena sa evābhivyaktaḥ sa evānabhivyakta iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1164: sacedanyāṃ tena sā sahetukā nirhetukā vā |
T06n1394u_003:1176: tasmādyo bhāvo nāsti sa nāstyeva tallakṣaṇaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1194: yenāsyaivaṃ bhavati nityaḥ śabda iti tasmādabhivyaktivādo'
T06n1394u_003:1198: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iha dhārmiko vā punarayoniśa evaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī |
T06n1394u_003:1209: iha dhārmiko vā punaḥ sūtrāntānayoniśaḥ kalpayati |
T06n1394u_003:1218: yo dharmo yena lakṣaṇena vyavasthitaḥ sa tena pariniṣpannaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1220: sacedatīto na syāttena tadā vihīnasvalakṣaṇaḥ syāt |
T06n1394u_003:1234: tena triṣvadhvasu tathaiva vidyata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1255: tenābhūtvā bhāva ekata eva yathoktā doṣā iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1256: tacca karma kaccidicchasi tasmādbhinnalakṣaṇaṃ abhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1260: tenākarmako bhūtvā sakarmako bhavatīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1263: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ svabhāvasaṅkaradoṣa iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1264: yathā'nāgataṃ vartamānaṃ ca evaṃ vartamānamatītaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ doṣayuktaṃ draṣṭavyamebhireva kāraṇairanenaivottaramārgeṇeti svalakṣaṇato'pi
T06n1394u_003:1284: tena yā nairātmyagrāhikā śaśaviṣāṇavandhyāputrādigrāhikā buddhirnaivāstīti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1285: yadapyuktaṃ sarvamasti yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanānīti tadapi sati sallakṣaṇāstitāṃ sandhāyoktaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1287: tathāhi sallakṣaṇā api dharmāḥ sallakṣaṇaṃ dhārayanti |
T06n1394u_003:1290: anyathā tu sato jñānādasataścājñānādyogino na nirantarajñeyadharmaparīkṣā syāditi na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1291: yadapyuktamastyatītaṃ karma yataḥ sattvāḥ savyābaddhā vyābādhāṃ vedayantīti |
T06n1394u_003:1293: yeṣu saṃskāreṣu yacchubhāśubhaṃ karmotpannaniruddhaṃ bhavati tena hetunā tena pratyayena viśiṣṭā saṃskārasantatiḥ pravartate sā vāsanetyucyate
T06n1394u_003:1294: yasyāḥ prabandhapatitāyā iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1296: yadapyuktamasti rūpamatītamastyanāgatamasti pratyutpannaṃ evaṃ yāvad vijñānamiti |
T06n1394u_003:1343: ito bāhyastīrthyaḥ satyataḥ sthitita ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vetyādi |
T06n1394u_003:1352: sacedātmā na syāt pañcabhirākāraiḥ pañcavidhavastudarśane satyātmabuddhirna pravarteta |
T06n1394u_003:1354: sukhaduḥkhāvadīrṇaṃ saṃskāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñābuddhireva pravarteta na sattvapatitocchritabuddhiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1357: nāminaṃ nāmasambaddhaṃ saṃskāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjñābuddhireva pravarteta |
T06n1394u_003:1358: na kṣatriyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vaiśyo vā śudro vā brahmadatto vā guṇamitro veti sattvabuddhiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1363: yataścaivamabuddhipūrvameṣu pañcasu vastuṣu pañcākārā sattvabuddhireva pravartate na saṃskārabuddhiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1364: tasmādabuddhipūrvaṃ tāvadasya dṛṣṭvā sattvabuddhipratyupalabdhita evaṃ bhavatyastyātmeti ||
T06n1394u_003:1366: sacedātmā na syānna saṃskāreṣu buddhipūrvā ceṣṭopalabhyeta |
T06n1394u_003:1367: ahaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyāmi paśyāmi dṛṣṭavān |
T06n1394u_003:1378: tena rūpādiṣu sattva iti viparyāsānna yujyate'styātmeti |
T06n1394u_003:1382: kṣatriyādibālapaṇḍito rūpādiṣu viṣayagrāhaka ātmeti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1385: tena yadeva paśyati tatraiva viparyastā buddhirityātmabuddhirna yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1386: sacedanyasmādapi tena sarvaviṣayāḥ sarvaviṣayabuddheḥ kāraṇībhavantīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1394: kaccidicchasi yāsau sattvabuddhiḥ sā pratyakṣārthagrāhikānumānārthagrāhikā veti |
T06n1394u_003:1396: tena rūpādayaḥ skandhā eva na sattvaḥ pratyakṣa iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1397: sacedānumānikārthagrāhikā tena bāladārakāṇāmapyanabhyūhya sahasā pravartate iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1406: savikāra ātmā ceṣṭata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1412: tadā sadāceṣṭaḥ punaśceṣṭata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1415: kaccidicchasi sahetukaṃ sattvaśceṣṭate nirhetukaṃ ceṣṭate veti |
T06n1394u_003:1419: sadā sarvakālaṃ sarvaṃ ceṣṭata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1422: ātmano vyādhiṃ jarāṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃkleśaṃ prati ceṣṭata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1426: kaccitskandhamātre sattvaprajñaptimicchasi skandheṣu vānyatra vā skandhebhyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1434: anugrahopaghāte vā punaḥ sati dharmādharmayoḥ pravṛttirna yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1436: aprayatne ca sadā mukta ātmeti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1438: pṛthaksaṃskārebhyo bhaṅgotpattiprabandhapravṛttito nopalabhyate iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1439: iha ca vinaṣṭasyānyatrākṛtābhyāgamadoṣa iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1446: tena kiṃ darśanādiṣu draṣṭṭatvādyupacāraṃ kṛtvā draṣṭṭatvalakṣaṇa āhosvitpṛthaktebhyaḥ |
