T06n1394u_003:1447: saceddarśanādiṣu upacāre tena darśanādīnyeva draṣṭṭaṇītyātmā draṣṭeti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1450: tena taddarśanādikamātmanaḥ karma vā syātkaraṇaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1456: sa kāmakārīṃ ca savārtheṣviti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1469: tena yathā dātrādanyā chedanādikriyā evaṃ darśanādanyaddarśanādyantaraṃ nopalabhyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1476: kaccidicchasi yatsaṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tatsaṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā |
T06n1394u_003:1479: tena yeṣu saṃskārepvītaya upadravā upasargāstadbyupaśamānugrahā vopalabhyante te saṃskārāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇayuktāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1480: ato'satyātmani te saṃkliśyante vyavadāyante ceti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1483: tena saṃkleśavyavadānalakṣaṇavirahitaḥ saṃkliśyate vyavadāyate vātmeti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1485: kaccidicchasi yatpravartakalakṣaṇayuktaṃ tatpravartate ca nivartate ca |
T06n1394u_003:1493: tenāntareṇātmānaṃ saṃskārā eva pravartante nivartante ceti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1495: tena pravartaka lakṣaṇahīna ātmā pravartate nivartate ceti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1500: sa bhoktā vā kartā vā moktā veti |
T06n1394u_003:1503: tena saṃskārā eva bhoktāraḥ kartāro moktāra ityanitya ātmā iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1505: tena moktā kartā moktātmeti nirvikāro na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1512: tena darśanādiṣvindriyeṣu kartrupacāra iti vyarthātmakalpaneti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1516: tena saṃvyavahāraḥ puruṣadehe guṇamitro buddhadatta ityevamādiḥ na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1518: tena saṃskāramātra ātmopacāra iti vyarthātmakalpaneti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1519: tathāhi saṃvyavahāraḥ puruṣa evātra sattva iti saṃjñāyate |
T06n1394u_003:1528: tena tathā sati aviparyaṃsteti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1529: sati ca tadviparyāse asyātmeti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1532: tena satyataḥ sthititaḥ satyātmani nairātmyadṛṣṭiḥ kuśalāviparīteti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1534: tena sarvajñadeśitā prayogajanitā mokṣānuttrāsakarī śuklaphalā doṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣabhūteti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1537: tena na kadācinnāstyātmeti buddhiḥ syāditi na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1539: tenāsatyapyātmani saṃskāramātra ātmadarśanavaśādastyātmeti manyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1541: evaṃ lakṣaṇavyavasthayā saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthayā pravṛttinivṛttivyavasthayā bhoktṛkartṛmoktṛdraṣṭṛprajñaptyāpi ātmāstīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1558: api caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ saṃskāreṣu sattvaprajñaptirveditavyā sukhasaṃvyavahārārthaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1565: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo veti pūrvavat |
T06n1394u_003:1572: śāśvatavādinaḥ ekatyaśāśvatikāśca pūrvāntakalpakā aparāntakalpakā vā saṃjñivādino'
T06n1394u_003:1578: tatra pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātradhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa atītādhvikaṃ pūrvāntaṃ kalpayatāṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyā pratītyasamutpādakuśalānāṃ atītasaṃskāreṣu smṛtimātraṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānatāṃ taddṛṣṭigatamutpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:1579: divyacakṣussaṃniśrayaṃ vā punarvartamānādhvikaṃ pūrvāntaṃ kalpayatāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgānupravṛttiṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ
T06n1394u_003:1581: brahmaṇo vā punaḥ svamanorathasiddhimupalabhataḥ mahābhūtavipariṇāmaṃ vijñānavipariṇāmaṃ copalabhamānasya ||
T06n1394u_003:1582: aparānte vā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ vedanābhedaṃ ca paśyato na svalakṣaṇabhedaṃ taddṛṣṭigatamutpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:1586: apacayapūrvakaṃ ca vināśaṃ kalpayato yenaivaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:1591: tatra pūrvāntakalpakānāmaparāntakalpakānāṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītatvācchāśvatavādasyātmavāde vidūṣita ātmano viśeṣalakṣaṇavādo'
T06n1394u_003:1599: bhavan sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmaivaṃjātya iti vistareṇa kathanaṃ na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1600: kaccidicchasi rūpāvalambane cakṣurvijñāne saṃmukhībhūte rūpa eva viṣaye samavahite tadanyeṣu viṣayeṣu vyavahiteṣu tadanyeṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ nirodho vā pravṛttirveti |
T06n1394u_003:1604: tenaikena viṣayeṇa sarvakālaṃ sarvavijñānapravṛttiriti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1605: kaccidicchasi astyātmanaḥ saṃjñākṛto vā vedanākṛto vā vikāro na veti |
T06n1394u_003:1606: tena śāśvata ātmā ca lokaśceti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1608: tenaikatvasaṃjñī bhūtvā nānātvasaṃjñī parīttasaṃjñī apramāṇasaṃjñī bhavatīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1609: ekāntasukhī ekāntaduḥkhī sukhaduḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhī bhavatīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1611: tatra yaḥ kaścitsajīvastaccharīramiti paśyati sa rūpiṇamātmānaṃ paśyati |
T06n1394u_003:1615: sa rūpiṇaṃ cārūpiṇaṃ ca tadvipakṣe caitamevārthamanyena padavyañjanenābhiniviśanneva rūpiṇamātmānaṃ nārūpiṇaṃ paśyati ||
T06n1394u_003:1616: sacetpunaḥ rūpiṇaṃ vārūpiṇaṃ vā parīttaṃ paśyati so'
T06n1394u_003:1623: tadvipakṣeṇa vā vyañjananānātvaṃ no tvarthanānātvamabhiniviśannāntavantaṃ nānantavantaṃ paśyati mukto vā punaradvayaṃ paśyati ||
T06n1394u_003:1626: kaccidicchasi aparīkṣitaṃ vā paramāṇunityatvaṃ parīkṣitaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1628: tena parīkṣāmantareṇa nityatvaniścaya iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1633: tena yadapacitaṃ tad durbalataramiti nityamiti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1637: kaccidicchasi paramāṇubhyaḥ sthūlaṃ dravyamabhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā bhinnalakṣaṇaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1640: na cāsti hetuniyamo na phalaniyama iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1642: tena kaccidicchasi vibhaktebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyo niṣpadyate saṃyuktebhyo vā |
T06n1394u_003:1644: tena sadā sarvakāryotpattirna ca hetuniyamo na ca phalaniyama iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1646: tena kaccidicchasi tasmādanatiricyamānavigrahamūrtti vā atiricyamānavigrahamūrtti veti |
T06n1394u_003:1651: sati sthūlamapi dravyaṃ nityamiti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1652: apūrvaparamāṇuprādurbhāve punaḥ paramāṇurnitya iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1659: tena dṛṣṭānto nopalabhyata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1663: sūkṣmaṃ dravyaṃ tadāśrayaṃ na sattvanaimittikamiti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1665: sacenna sattvanaimittikī tena niṣprayojano bāhyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ prādurbhāvo na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1669: pi pūrvāntakalpakānāmaparāntakalpakānāṃ ca śāśvatavādo na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1687: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo veti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1690: paurāṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tapasā vyantībhāvāditi dṛṣṭadharmikeṇa kaṣṭenetyabhiprāyaḥ | navānāṃ ca
T06n1394u_003:1695: karmakṣayāddaḥkhakṣaya iti pūrvakṛtahetukasya ca dṛṣṭadharmaupakramikasya cetyabhiprāyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1711: kaccidicchasi yattaddṛṣṭadharmaupakramikaṃ duḥkhaṃ tatpūrvakṛtahetukaṃ vā dṛṣṭadharmopakramahetukaṃ veti |
T06n1394u_003:1713: tena paurāṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tapasā vyantībhāvātpratyutpannānāṃ vā
T06n1394u_003:1716: yatkiñcidayaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ pratisaṃvedayate sarvaṃ tatpūrvakṛtahetukamiti na yujyate ityaupakramikasya duḥkhasya pūrvakṛtahetukatāpi puruṣakārahetukatāpi na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1720: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ svakarmādhipatyenāpāyeṣu votpadyate nīceṣu vā kṛcchreṣu vā kuleṣu |
T06n1394u_003:1730: saddharmaṃ śṛṇvato dharmānabhimukhamabhisambudhyataḥ īryāpathaṃ kalpayataḥ śilpakarmasthānāni śikṣataḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1734: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo veti vistareṇa pūrvavat |
T06n1394u_003:1735: yatkiñcidayaṃ puruṣapudgalaḥ pratisaṃvedayate sarva tadīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vā puruṣāntaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vetyevamādi |
T06n1394u_003:1744: sattvā hetukāle ca śubhe pravartsyāma ityakāmakāḥ pāpe'
T06n1394u_003:1746: phalakāle ca sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapatsyāmaḥ ityapāyeṣūpapadyante |
T06n1394u_003:1748: yenaiṣāmevaṃ bhavati asti sa kaścitkartā sraṣṭā nirmātā pitṛbhūto bhāvānāmīśvarastadanyo veti ||
T06n1394u_003:1753: yattadīśvarasya nirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ tatkaccidicchasi karmayogahetukaṃ vāhetukaṃ veti |
T06n1394u_003:1767: tena nāsti ca prayojanaṃ sṛjatīti ca na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1771: yadāsargastadeśvara itīśvarahetukaḥ sarga iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1773: tena tadicchāhetuko vā syādicchāṃ vā sthāpayitvā tadanyopādānahetukaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1777: yadeśvarastadecchā yadecchā tadeśvara iti nityaṃ sargeṇa bhavitavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1780: tatra ca neśvaro jagadīśvara iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1791: yaśca juhoti yaśca hūyate ye ca tatsahāyāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svargamanāya bhavatīti |
T06n1394u_003:1793: utsaṃsthavāda eṣa śaṭhaviṭhapito natu yuktimabhisamīkṣya vyavasthāpitaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1794: kaliyuge pratyupasthite brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaṃ brāhmaṇadharmamatikramya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitukāmairetatpratyupakalpitaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:1795: apitu sa idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ kaccidicchasi yo'
T06n1394u_003:1796: sau mantravidhiḥ sa dharmasvabhāvo vādharmasvabhāvo veti |
T06n1394u_003:1803: evaṃ vyāvṛtte ca punaḥ satyuttari vadet |
T06n1394u_003:1804: tadyathā nāma viṣaṃ mantravidhiparigṛhītaṃ na vinipātayati |
T06n1394u_003:1807: kaccidicchasi yathā mantravidhirbāhyaṃ viṣaṃ praśamayati evamādhyātmikaṃ rāgadveṣamohaviṣamiti |
T06n1394u_003:1809: sa ca praśamo na kutracitkadācitkasyacittathopalabhyata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1811: tena yathā mantravidhirbāhyaṃ viṣaṃ praśamayati tathādharmamiti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1815: iṣṭaḥ svajana ādito na hūyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1822: tena paśurapi paśukāyaṃ hitvā devakāyaṃ gṛhṇātīti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1824: sau mantrāṇāṃ praṇetā sa śaktaḥ kāruṇiko vā |
T06n1394u_003:1827: tadāntareṇa prāṇātipātaṃ sarvaṃ lokaṃ svargaṃ nayatīti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:1837: yacca na dharmāya kalpate tasya lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmi |
T06n1394u_003:1838: yatparavyābādhakaṃ karma na ca dṛṣṭaṃ doṣapratikriyaṃ tattāvanna dharmāya kalpate |
T06n1394u_003:1840: yacca sarvajñairekāṃśena bhāṣitaṃ makuśalamiti svayamanīpsitaṃ ca yat |
T06n1394u_003:1842: vidyādimaṅgalopetaṃ ca yat tadapi na dharmāya bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:1845: tadyathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā laukikadhyānasaṃniśrayeṇāntasaṃjñī lokasya viharatyanantakasaṃjñī ubhayasaṃjñī nobhayasaṃjñī |
T06n1394u_003:1850: tatrocchedaparyavasānato lokasyāntaṃ samanveṣamāṇo yadā saṃvartakalpaṃ samanusmarati tadāntakasaṃjñī bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:1857: tadvipakṣeṇa vā punarvyañjanaviśeṣābhiniveśo na tvarthābhiniveśo naivāntakasaṃjñī nāpyanantakasaṃjñī ||
T06n1394u_003:1874: jñānabhayabhītaśca spaṣṭaṃ na vyākaroti na jānāmīti |
T06n1394u_003:1875: dvitīyaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhīto mṛṣāvādabhayabhīto mithyādṛṣṭibhayabhītaḥ spaṣṭaṃ na vyākarotyadhigatavānasmīti |
T06n1394u_003:1876: tṛtīyo mithyādṛṣṭibhayabhītaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhītaḥ spaṣṭaṃ na vyākarotyahamadhigatavānasmīti |
T06n1394u_003:1878: caturthaḥ paryanuyogabhayabhīta evaṃ sarveṇa sarvamabhyudayamārgo niḥśreyasamārga iti vyañjanamātrakuśalo'
T06n1394u_003:1892: so'pi dhyānasaṃniśrayeṇa tarkasaṃniśrayeṇa ca dvividho yathāsūtrameva veditavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1893: kena kāraṇena tarkasaṃniśrayeṇaivaṃ paśyatyahetukamutpanna ātmā lokaśca samāsena |
T06n1394u_003:1894: anabhisandhipūrvakamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānāmaparimāṇaṃ vaicitryamupalabhya hetūnāṃ caikadā vaicitryamupalabhya akasmādekadā vāyavo vānti ekadā na vānti |
T06n1394u_003:1895: akasmādekadā nadyaḥ syandanti ekadā na syandanti |
T06n1394u_003:1896: akasmādeke vṛkṣāḥ puṣpanti phalanti ekadā na puṣpanti na phalantītyevamādi ||
T06n1394u_003:1902: tenāhaṃ pūrvaṃ nābhūvaṃ paścātsamutpanna iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1910: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vaivaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī yāvadātmārūpyaudārikaścāturmahābhūtikastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati tāvatsarogaḥ sagaṇḍaḥ saśalyaḥ sajvaraḥ saparitāpaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1911: yataścātmocchidyate vinaśyati na bhavati paraṃ maraṇādiyatātmā samucchinno bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:1926: ubhayathāyujyamānatāṃ paśyannevaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī ātmocchidyate vinaśyati na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi |
T06n1394u_003:1935: tena skandhā anityāḥ hetuphalaparamparāḥ pravṛttāḥ samucchidyante ceti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:1936: sacedātmā samucchidyate rūppaudārikaścāturmahābhūtikaḥ sarogaḥ sagaṇḍaḥ saśalyaḥ sajvaraḥ saparitāpo divyaḥ kāmāvacaro divyo rūpāvacaro rūpyākāśānantyāyatanopago yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagaṃ iti |
T06n1394u_003:1944: nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭamiti vistareṇa yāvanna loke'rhanniti |
T06n1394u_003:1953: paśyati cainaṃ cyutaṃ kālagataṃ nīceṣu kuleṣu pratyājāyamānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1959: punaḥ paśyatyekatyaṃ sucaritacāriṇaṃ vā duścaritacāriṇaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:1960: paśyati cainaṃ cyutaṃ kālagatamapāya durgativinipāte narakeṣūpapadyamānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:1979: tasya mātāpitraniyamaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhavati nāsti mātā |
T06n1394u_003:1981: ekatyasya vā pudgalasyopapattiṃ samanveṣamāṇo na paśyati |
T06n1394u_003:1986: nāsti sattva upapādukastadāyatanamaprajānataḥ arhattvābhimāniko vā punaḥ svayamātmanaḥ upapattiṃ paśyati cyavamānaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:1991: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā gambhīrā gambhīrābhāsā nirabhilapyadharmatāmārabhya |
T06n1394u_003:2007: tena yo'pyanyaḥ śubhāśubhakarmābhisaṃskāraḥ sa sakṛdupapadyaṃ śubhāśubhakarmaṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2008: kaccidicchasi yā yaṃ janayati mātā vā sā tasya na veti |
T06n1394u_003:2009: yo yasya bījātsaṃbhavati pitā vā sa tasya na veti |
T06n1394u_003:2011: nāsti mātā nāsti piteti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2012: sacenna mātā na pitā tena janayati |
T06n1394u_003:2014: sa ca mātā piteti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2017: yadā duhitā putro bhavati tadā na mātā na pitā |
T06n1394u_003:2018: kaccidicchasi asti tadāyatanaṃ yatropapadyamānaḥ sattvo na dṛśyate divyena cakṣuṣā nāsti veti |
T06n1394u_003:2020: tena nāsti sattva upapāduka iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2022: tena saṃjñāvairāgyaṃ rūpavairāgyaṃ traidhātukavairāgyamapoditaṃ bhavatīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2028: tena yo'pi kaścidayoniśo vṛtto viparītaṃ manyate so'
T06n1394u_003:2031: kaccidicchasi asti pariniṣpannalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ paratantralakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitalakṣaṇo nāsti vā |
T06n1394u_003:2033: tena sarvaṃ sarveṇa lakṣaṇena nāstīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2035: tena nāsti viparyāso nāsti saṃkleśo nāsti vyavadānamiti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2051: brāhmaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā aurasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanirgatā brahmapārṣadā iti |
T06n1394u_003:2063: tena pratyakṣaṃ yonijā tatā mātṛsambhavatā brāhmaṇavarṇasyāpoditā bhavatīti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2065: pi tādṛśo bhavatīti tena brāhmaṇā agro varṇo hīno'
T06n1394u_003:2067: yathā yonijaṃ mātṛsambhūtamevamakuśalakāriṇaṃ kuśalakāriṇaṃ ca kāyavāṅmanoduścaritakāriṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritakāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭadhārmikamaniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavantamiṣṭaṃ vā punaḥ sāmparāyikaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2068: apāyeṣūpapadyamānaṃ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyamānaṃ trayāṇāṃ vā sthānānāṃ sammukhībhāvāda yato vā mātuḥ kukṣāvupapadyamānaṃ laukikaśilpasthāna-karmasthānaṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā rājānaṃ tadbhṛtyaṃ vā dakṣamutthanasampannaṃ vā rājasaṃgrāhyaṃ vā upasthānāyāsaṃgrāhyaṃ vā vyādhidharmakaṃ vā jarādharmakaṃ vā maraṇadharmakaṃ vā brāhmān vihārānbhāvayitvā brahmaloka upapadyamānaṃ vā bodhipakṣyadharmān bhāvayantaṃ vābhāvayantaṃ vā śrāvakabodhiṃ pratyeka buddha bodhimanuttarasamyaksambodhimabhisambudhyamānaṃ vānabhisambudhyamānaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:2069: kaccidicchasi yonita eva yo viśiṣṭaḥ sa vara āhosvicchru tena śīlena vā punaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2071: tena yajñe yaḥ śrutapradhānaḥ śīlapradhānaḥ sa pramāṇaṃ parigrāhya iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2072: sacecchrutena vā śīlena vā tena brāhmaṇā agro varṇo hīno'
T06n1394u_003:2087: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vaivaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī yataścātmā muktiṃ cittavaśitāṃ cānuprāpto yogavaśitāṃ cānuprāpto divyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
T06n1394u_003:2089: yataśca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarka savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati |
T06n1394u_003:2092: yathāpi tadevaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī sarvapāpānyasyāpaharati yo nadyāṃ sundarikāyāṃ snāti |
T06n1394u_003:2093: yathā sundarikāyāmevaṃ bāhudāyāṃ gayāyāṃ sarasvatyāṃ nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2095: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ kukkuravratena śuddhiṃ manyate govratena nakulavratena nagnabratena bhasmavratena kaṣṭavratena niṣṭhāvratenetyevaṃbhāgīyairvratasamādānaiḥ śuddhaṃ manyate |
T06n1394u_003:2102: sa sarvatra īśitvavaśitvaprāptaḥ kāmeśvaro bhavati yogeśvaraḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2104: yathāpīhaikatya ātmanigraheṇātmanaḥ pāpavimokṣaṃ paśyati kṛtāparādho vāparādhavimokṣaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2107: sau pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍati sa kāmavītarāgo vāvītarāgo veti |
T06n1394u_003:2108: sa cedvītarāgaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayatīti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2109: sa cedavītarāgo muktaḥ śuddha iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2111: sau caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati sa sarvavītarāgo vāsarvavītarāgo vā |
T06n1394u_003:2112: sacet sarvavītarāgaḥ yāvaccaturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2118: tena tīrthasnānena viśudhyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2125: śucisammatā loka iti tadupādānena śuddhirna yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2127: tena prakūtyā śuci vastu śuddhaye saṃvartata iti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2128: kaccidicchasi sati kukkurādivratopādāne kāyaduścaritādimithyāpratipattiḥ śuddhaye saṃvartate kāyasucaritādisamyakpratipattirveti |
T06n1394u_003:2130: tena mithyā ca pratipadyate śuddhyate ceti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2132: tena kukkurādi vratamapārthakamiti tena śuddhiriti na yujyate ||
T06n1394u_003:2143: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śramaṇo brāhmaṇo vaivaṃdṛṣṭirbhavatyevaṃvādī ādityacandragrahatithivaiguṇyena manorathānāmasiddhirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:2153: sa ca lābhī bhavati laukikānāṃ dhyānānāṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2155: sa ātmanaḥ sampattikāmaiḥ samṛddhikāmaistatra praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pratītyasamutpannāṃ karmagatiṃ yathābhūtamaprajānnanyenādityacandragrahanakṣatratithisamudācāreṇa śubhāśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ sattveṣu phalaṃ vipacyamānaṃ paśyati |
T06n1394u_003:2161: tena puṇyakarmaṇāmapuṇyakarmaṇāṃ ca yāvajjīvamanuvartanīyā sampattirvipattiśca saṃdṛśyata iti na yujyate |
T06n1394u_003:2169: itīme ṣoaḍaśa paravādā abhinirhārayā parīkṣyāyuktyopaparīkṣitāḥ sarvathā na yujyante ||
T06n1394u_003:2187: yo dharma utpadyamānaḥ svayaṃ cāpraśāntalakṣaṇa utpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:2199: syātpañcavidho duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyo nirodhadarśanaprahātavyo mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanādarśanaprahātavyaśca
T06n1394u_003:2202: syātsaptavidhaḥ saptānuśayāḥ kāmarāgānuśayaḥ pratighānuśayo bhavarāgānuśayo mānānuśayo'
T06n1394u_003:2207: anunayasaṃyojanaṃ pratighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanamavidyāsaṃyojanaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃyojanaṃ parāmarśasaṃyojanaṃ vicikitsāsaṃyojana mīrṣyāsaṃyojanaṃ mātsaryasaṃyojanaṃ ca ||
T06n1394u_003:2208: syāddaśavidhaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭirmithyā dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlaparāmarśo rāgaḥ pratigho māno'
T06n1394u_003:2217: tatra kāmāvacare duḥkhasatye samudayasatye kāmāvacarādhipateye nirodhasatye mārgasatye sarve daśakleśā vipratipannāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2218: rūpāvacare duḥkhasatye samudayasatye tadādhipateye nirodhasatye mārgasatye pratighavarjāsta eva daśa kleśā vipratipannāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2220: kāmāvacarapratipakṣe bhāvanāyāṃ ṣaṭ kleśā vipratipannā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśaṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ ca sthāpayitvā ||
T06n1394u_003:2221: rūpāvacarapratipakṣe bhāvanāyāṃ pañca kleśā vipratipannā ebhya eva ṣaḍbhyaḥ pratighaṃ sthāpayitvā ||
T06n1394u_003:2225: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā punaḥ smṛtisampramoṣaṃ pañcopādānaskandhānātmano vātmīyato vā samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritā kliṣṭā prajñā ||
T06n1394u_003:2227: asatpuruṣasaṃsevāmāgamyāsaddharma śravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā punasmṛtisampramoṣaṃ pañcopādānaskandhānātmato gṛhītvā śāśvatato vocchedato vā samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritā'
T06n1394u_003:2230: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ hetuṃ vāpavadataḥ phalaṃ vā kriyāṃ vā sadbhāvaṃ vastu nāśayato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
T06n1394u_003:2232: asatpuruṣa sevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśo manaskāraṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimantagrāhadṛṣṭiṃ sāśrayāṃ sālambanāṃ sanidānāṃ sahabhūsamprayogāṃ paradṛṣṭimupanidhāyāgrataḥ śreṣṭhato viśiṣṭataḥ paramataśca samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
T06n1394u_003:2235: yattāmeva dṛṣṭiṃ taddṛṣṭyanucaraṃ śīlaṃ vā vrataṃ vā sāśrayaṃ sālambanaṃ sanidānaṃ sasahabhūsamprayogaṃ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataśca samanupaśyato yā nirdhāritaiva kliṣṭā prajñā ||
T06n1394u_003:2237: asatpuruṣasevāmāgamyāsaddharmaśravaṇamayoniśomanaskāraṃ naisargikaṃ vā smṛtisampramoṣaṃ bahirdhādhyātmaṃ vā nirdhāritamiṣṭaviṣayādyavasānaṃ
T06n1394u_003:2243: naisargikaṃ vā smṛtisampramoṣamāgamya yādhyātmaṃ bahirdhā vā nirdhāritā'
T06n1394u_003:2244: nirdhāritā vā uccanīcatāyāṃ hīnapraṇītatāyāṃ ca cittasya unnatiḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2246: asatpuruṣaṃ smṛtisampramoṣaṃ yajjñeye vastuni nirdhāritaṃ vānirdhāritaṃ vā kliṣṭamajñānaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2248: asatpuruṣaṃ manaskāraṃ yā jñeye vastuni nirdhāritaiva saṃśaya matiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2268: anuśayāvasthā paryavasthānāvasthā parikalpitāvasthā sahajāvasthā mṛdvavasthā madhyāvasthādhimātrāvasthā ||
T06n1394u_003:2280: api khalu saptabhirmukhaiḥ sarvakleśā darśanabhāvanāvibandhakarā āvaraṇabhūtā veditavyāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2281: tadyathā mithyāvagamanataḥ anavagamanataḥ avagamānavagamanataḥ mithyāvagamapratipattitaḥ tannidānapadasthānataḥ taduttrāsasaṃjananataḥ nisargasamudācārataśca
T06n1394u_003:2284: samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhākārairāpattita upapattitaḥ santānato vastutaḥ karmasamutthānataḥ paryantataśca |
T06n1394u_003:2287: tatra santānato yo rāgādicaritānāṃ paripakvendriyāṇāṃ yūnāmaparinirvāṇakadharmāṇāṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:2290: tatra karmasamutthānato yena kleśaparyavasthānenābhibhūtaḥ paryāptaḥ kāyavākkarma samutthāpayati |
T06n1394u_003:2302: yo'nitye nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti aśacau śucīti anātmanyātmeti saṃjñāparikalpaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2304: ya statraiva tathā saṃjñāparikalpite kṣāntī rucirvyavasthāpanābhiniveśaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2313: viparyāsaniṣyando mithyādṛṣṭirantagrāhadṛṣṭerekadeśaḥ pratigho māno vicikitsā ca ||
T06n1394u_003:2319: śīlavrataparāmarśo duḥkhe sukhamiti viparyāsaḥ rāga ubhayathā apyaśucau śucīti viparyāsaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2325: saṃyojanāni bandhanānyanuśayā upakleśāḥ paryavasthānāni oghā upādānāni granthā nīvaraṇāni khilā malā nighrāḥ śalyāni kiñcanā mūlāni duścaritānyāsravā vighātāḥ paridāhā upāyāsā raṇā agnayojvarā vanasthā vinibandhāścetyevaṃbhāgīyāḥ kleśaparyāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2352: prādhānyāttu bhagavatā tasmiṃstasmiṃnsparyāye te te kleśāḥ sthāpitāḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2361: oghā iti catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyogho'
T06n1394u_003:2372: yathā khilānyevaṃ malā nidhāni śalyāni kiñcana duścaritāni ca ||
T06n1394u_003:2380: yathā vighātā evaṃ paridāhā upāyāsā raṇā agnayo jvarā vanathāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2381: vinibandhā iti pañca vinibandhā kāyāpekṣā kāmāpekṣā saṃsṛṣṭavihāritā ānulomikakathāvaikalyaṃ alpāvara mātrasantuṣṭiśca ||
T06n1394u_003:2384: tadyathā kleśa utpadyamāna ādita eva cittaṃ saṃkleśayati ālambane viparyāsaṃ karoti |
T06n1394u_003:2388: dṛṣṭadharmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāmparāyikaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate |
T06n1394u_003:2403: gurutātha viparyāsaḥ paryāyo doṣa eva ca ||
T06n1394u_003:2410: yo dharma utpadyamāno abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaścotpadyate tasya cotpādātkāyābhisaṃskāro vāgabhisaṃskārastaduttarakālaṃ pravartate |
T06n1394u_003:2427: tatra pudgalalakṣaṇavyavasthānaṃ yathoktaṃ yathā prāṇātipātikaḥ khalu bhavati vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ tatra prāṇātipātikaḥ khalu bhavatītyuddeśapadamidaṃ
T06n1394u_003:2436: yojanaśatasyārvāgye prāṇinastebhyaḥ saṃvṛtā vā bhavantyasaṃvṛtā veti |
T06n1394u_003:2438: ta eva punarevamāhuryathā vṛkṣādayo bāhyabhāvāḥ prāṇibhūtā iti |
T06n1394u_003:2440: iti satpuṇyaviratipratipakṣaśca khyāpito bhavati asatpuṇyaviratipratipakṣaśca khyāpito bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:2445: sati pratyaye vyutthānāvakāśaḥ paridīpito yāvadaviratastāvat prāṇātipātika iti samāsārthaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2446: punaḥ sarvairebhiḥ padaiḥ prāṇātipātikaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇātipātakriyā prāṇātipātanidānaṃ prāṇātipātavastukriyāprabhedaśca paridīpito bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:2450: yacca prāṇinaṃ ghātayataḥ prāṇātipātikatvamasya bhavati tadetatparidīpitamiti |
T06n1394u_003:2454: tadeva yadgrāme sthāpitaṃ sañcāritaṃ vāraṇyagataṃ veti |
T06n1394u_003:2455: yadaraṇye jātaṃ vā saṃkṣiptaṃ vā sañcāritaṃ vā tadeva steyasaṃkhyātamiti |
T06n1394u_003:2460: tatra yaddāyakena svāminā na pūrvaṃ dattaṃ dānayogena tadadattamityucyate |
T06n1394u_003:2476: yathāpi tanmātāpitarau svāṃ duhitaṃ patipariṇayananimittaṃ tadanyena saha maiuthunato gopayati rakṣati kālena kālamavalokayati |
T06n1394u_003:2477: uparate vā punastasmin sambandhena bhrātrā vā bhaginyā vā rakṣitā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:2484: sā khalveṣā pariṇītāyāstrividhārakṣā paridīpitā bhavati samāsataḥ gurusnigdhajanāvalokanārakṣā rājayuktakulārakṣā dvārapālārakṣā ca ||
T06n1394u_003:2494: mithyācāritramāpadyata iti anaṅgādeśākāleṣu ye svasyāmapi bhāryāyāṃ sāvadyā bhavanti iti samāsārthaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2495: punaryāṃ gacchato yathāgacchataḥ kāmamithyācāro bhavati tadetatparidīpitaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2497: apṛthaccheṇyaḥ pariṣad tāsāṃ samavāyaścāturdiśasya janakāyasya tribhirvyavahārairanubhūtaṃ yattajjñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2502: āmiṣakiñcitkahetoriti dhanadhānyahiraṇyādinimittaṃ mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣata iti vinidhāya ruciṃ dṛṣṭiṃ bhāṣaṇāt |
T06n1394u_003:2504: nyathā bhāṣaṇato nidānataḥ saṃjñāvivādataśca mṛṣāvādo veditavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2512: vyagrarataḥ prītisambhavavilopane kliṣṭacittatayā vyagrakaraṇīṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate'
T06n1394u_003:2514: samāsārthaḥ punarbhedābhiprāyatā abhinnabhedaprayogatā bhinnabhedaprayogatā bhedakliṣṭacittatā paraprayojanatā ca paridīpitā bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:2528: sā khalveṣā nelāmupādāya yāvadaparyādattāntā trividhā veditavyā |
T06n1394u_003:2537: yā sammodikā sā bahujanasyeṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā ca |
T06n1394u_003:2552: cintayitvā samyagupanidhyāya deśanayā niśamya vācaṃ bhāṣitā bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:2553: paribhūya śṛṇvate deśanā parakāle na pūrveṇāparasambaddhārthatayā prakīrṇā |
T06n1394u_003:2558: samāsārthaḥ punaryathā nirdiṣṭakālatraye saṃbhinnapralāpa eva paridīpitaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2564: yatpareṣāṃ tanmama syādityabhidhyāyāḥ pravṛttyākāra eṣa paridīpitaḥ samāsato'
T06n1394u_003:2576: trividhābhiprāyasya dānasyāpavādādbhogābhiprāyasya śuddhyabhiprāyasya devatāpūjābhiprāyasya nāsti dattaṃ nāstīṣṭaṃ nāsti hutamityāha |
T06n1394u_003:2580: tasya trividhasya savipakṣapratipakṣasya kuśalasyāpavādānnāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛta karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka ityāha |
T06n1394u_003:2593: bhāvanāmārgeṇopasampādya iti svayaṃ ca jñānātpareṣāṃ cāropaṇātsvasyādhigamasya pravedayante iti kṣīṇā me jātirityevamādi pūrvavadvibhāgo veditavyaḥ
T06n1394u_003:2596: tatra kriyā bījopanikṣepaṇakriyā dhāraṇākriyā āgamanagamanakriyā upapattisaṃvartanīyakarmakriyā ||
T06n1394u_003:2600: tatra pravṛttyapavāde hetvapavādo draṣṭavyo na svalakṣaṇāpavādaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2601: nivṛttyapavāde punarguṇāpavādo draṣṭavyo na pudgalavāda iti ||
T06n1394u_003:2619: tadanyena hastasaṃsargādikenopāyena śukraśoṇitavimokṣaṇādapraṇidhāya ca brahmacaryābhyupagamādvirato grāmadharmāt |
T06n1394u_003:2625: tatra tatrādhikaraṇe prāmāṇikatvena sthāpyate tathā ca viśvāsa māpanneṣvavisaṃvādanādanabhidrohaṇādavisaṃvādakaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2631: vadhābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paraprāṇini tatraiva vadhaprayoge vadhaniṣṭhāyāṃ yatkāyakarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2633: apahārābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paraparigṛhīte vastuni tatraivāhāraprayoge tatraivāpahāraniṣṭhāyāṃ yatkāyakarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2635: sevābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ agamyānaṅgādeśākāleṣu tatraiva kāmamithyācāraprayogaḥ kāmamithyācāraniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yat kāya karma ||
T06n1394u_003:2637: vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ vaktu kāmasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattve tatraiva kūṭasākṣiprayoge kūṭasākṣiniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma |
T06n1394u_003:2639: bhedābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattveṣu tatraiva bhedaprayoge bhedaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma |
T06n1394u_003:2641: paruṣaṃ vaktukāmasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasattveṣu tatraiva paruṣavacanaprayoge paruṣavacananiṣṭhāyāṃ ca yadvākkarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2647: parasvīkaraṇābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ parasvīkaraṇābhiprāye niścayaprayoge tanniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2649: paravyāpādābhiprāyasya kliṣṭacetasaḥ paravyāpādābhiprāyaniścayaprayoge tanniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2654: prāṇātipāta ādīnavābhiprāyasya kuśalacetasastatsaṃyamaprayoge tat saṃyamaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yatkāyakarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2657: adattādāna ādīnavābhiprāyasya yāvanmithyādṛṣṭāvādīnavābhiprāyasya kuśalacetasa tatsaṃyamaprayoge tatsaṃyamaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca yanmanaskarma ||
T06n1394u_003:2663: lobho dveṣo mohaḥ ātmā para parānuvṛttirāmiṣabhayamapakāranimittaṃ krīḍāratidharmasaṃjñā mithyādṛṣṭiśca ||
T06n1394u_003:2670: mṛdunā kuśalena manuṣyeṣūtpadyate madhyena kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu |
T06n1394u_003:2676: kuśalaṃ vā punaralobhādveṣāmohanidānaṃ tathaiva yathāyogaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2686: tatra vipākaphalataḥ prāṇātipāta ātmacitte bhāvite bahulīkṛte narakeṣu vipāko vipacyate |
T06n1394u_003:2702: akuśalānāṃ karmaṇāmāsevitatvād bhāvitatvādbahulīkṛtatvāttenādhipatinā bāhyā bhāvā alpaujaskaphalā bhavanti asampannaphalāḥ pūtiphalāḥ parivṛttaphalāḥ śīrṇaphalā asvāduphalā asadāphalā alpakaphalā apathyaphalā aphalāśca |
T06n1394u_003:2705: dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ karma dṛṣṭaphalaṃ bhavatyakuśalaṃ vā kuśalaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:2709: pakārāśayaḥ karuṇāśaya āghātāśayaḥ prasādāśayaḥ kṛtaghnāśayaḥ kṛtajñāśayaśca ||
T06n1394u_003:2726: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe vānyatamānyatamasminvā gurusthānīye vastunyadhimātramāghātāśayaṃ pratighātāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
T06n1394u_003:2729: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe bādhimātraṃ prasādāśayamadhibhuktyāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
T06n1394u_003:2732: yathāpīhaikatyo mātari vā pitari vānyatamānyatamasminvopakāravastunyadhimātraṃ kṛtaghnāśayamabhidrohāśayaṃ raudrāśayamabhisaṃskaroti ||
T06n1394u_003:2735: yathāpīhaikatyo mātari pitari vānyatamānyatamasminvopakāravastunyadhimātraṃ kṛtajñāśayaṃ pratyupakārāśayamadhimātra mabhisaṃskaroti ||
T06n1394u_003:2745: devatāyataneṣu vā catvareṣu vā śṛṅgāṭakeṣu vā paśuvadhamanupravartayati |
T06n1394u_003:2746: viśvastaṃ vā paramaviśvāsaprāptaṃ mitraṃ vā suhṛdaṃ vā vayasyakaṃ vā druhyativpaṃsayati vipravāsayati |
T06n1394u_003:2747: duḥkhitaṃ vā punarniṣkiñcanamanāthamapratiśaraṇaṃ śaraṇāgatamapradānenopa gṛhyottaratrābhidruhyati pīḍāyai pratipadyate |
T06n1394u_003:2752: yathāpīhaikatyo mātaramaśrāddhāṃ śraddhāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati |
T06n1394u_003:2758: evaṃ karuṇāyānirodhasamāpatteḥ srotaāpattiphalādvyutthitamarhatvaphalācca piṇḍakena pratipādayati kārānvā prayuṃkte |
T06n1394u_003:2761: eṣveva vā punarvastuṣu viparyayeṇākuśalamapi karma dṛṣṭhadharmavedanīyaṃ bhavatyapakāranaimittikaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2768: yathā buddhā evaṃ cakravartino maitravihāriṇaśca bodhisattvāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2769: tathā bodhisattvaḥ karuṇāśayo daridrān duḥkhitān daivopahatān sattvānabhisamīkṣyānnena pānena dhanena dhānyena kośena santarpayati |
T06n1394u_003:2770: te ca tena pratyayena sukhasparśaṃ viharanti |
T06n1394u_003:2775: prāṇopaghāto bhogopaghāto dāropaghātaḥ kūṭasākṣyupaghātaḥ sahāyopaghāto doṣasamākhyānopaghātaḥ prasādopasaṃhāropaghāto bhayopasaṃhāropaghātaśca
T06n1394u_003:2782: yathāpīhaikatyastīvreṇa lobhadveṣamohaparyavasānena tīvreṇa vālobhādveṣāmohābhisaṃskāreṇa karma samutthāpayati |
T06n1394u_003:2784: yathāpīhaikatyena kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā karma dīrgharātramāsevitaṃ bhavati bhāvitaṃ bahulīkṛtaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2795: yathāpīhaikatyo buddhe vā dharme vā saṅghe vānyatamānyatamasminvā gurusthānīye vastuni gurukavastukamevāpakāraṃ vopakāraṃ vā prayuṅkte ||
T06n1394u_003:2797: yathāpīhaikatya ekāṃśenaivākuśalaṃ karma samādāya vartate yāvajjīvaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2801: kuśalaṃ karma vipakṣabhūtaṃ prahāya kuśalaṃ karma viśodhayati ||
T06n1394u_003:2810: tatra cāsti prāṇātipāto no tu prāṇātipātikamavadyam api tu prāṇātipātajātīyaṃ prāṇātipātasadṛśamanusabhāgamavadyaṃ prasavati |
T06n1394u_003:2811: no cedanyaṃ prāṇinaṃ ghātayati apitvaprāṇibhūte vastuni prahṛtya prāṇī me ghātita iti manyate |
T06n1394u_003:2812: tatra nāsti prāṇātipāto nāsti prāṇātipātikamavadyamapitu prāṇātipātajātīyaṃ prāṇātipātasadṛśamanusabhāgamavadyaṃ prasavati ||
T06n1394u_003:2813: yathā prāṇātipāta evamadattādānādiṣu karmapatheṣu kriyāviparyāso yathāyogaṃ veditavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:2818: nāsti ghnato vā ghātayato vā adattamādadānasya kāmeṣu mithyācarato mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya paiśunyamācarataḥ paruṣāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya saṃbhinnaṃ pralapato dānāni vāpunardadata upavāsamupavasataḥ puṇyāni kurvataḥ śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānasya nāstyato nidānaṃ pāpaṃ vā puṇyaṃ veti |
T06n1394u_003:2821: hatvā ca punastatonidānaṃ puṇyameva bhavati na pāpaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2822: teṣu cādattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāro mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ puṇyāyaiva bhavati nāpuṇyāya ||
T06n1394u_003:2850: vaṅkakarma doṣakarma kaṣāyakarma śucikarma munikarma ceti ||
T06n1394u_003:2852: yaccetitaṃ cetayitvā punaḥ kāyena vācā samutthāpitaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2853: akṛtaṃ karma yadacetitamacetayitvā punarna kāyena na vācā samutthāpitaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2856: tadyathā svapnakṛtamajñānakṛtamasañcityakṛtamatīvrānatitīkṣṇakṛtaṃ bhrāntikṛtaṃ smṛtisampramoṣakṛtamanicchākṛtaṃ prakṛtyavyākṛtaṃ vipratisāropahataṃ pratipakṣopahataṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:2868: saṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ karma yatprātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā dhyānasamāpattiprahāṇasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā ||
T06n1394u_003:2872: aurabhrikāḥ kaukkuṭikāḥ saukarikāḥ śvaśākuntikāḥ śaśavāgurikāścaurā vadhyaghātā bandhanapālakāḥ sūcakāḥ kāraṇākārāpakā nāgabandhakā nāgamaṇḍalikāśca
T06n1394u_003:2874: trividhaṃ ca saṃvaraṃ sthāpayitvā āsaṃvarikanaikāyikaṃ ca karma sthāpayitvā tadanyanaikāyikaṃ yatkuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ karma dānamayaṃ nidānataḥ samutthānataḥ svabhāvato'
T06n1394u_003:2878: samutthānataḥ deyavastu parityāgāya kāyavākkarmasamutthāpikā cetanā alobhādveṣāmohasahagatā |
T06n1394u_003:2881: yathā dānamayamevaṃ śīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2882: tatra śīlamayasya nidānaṃ samutthānaṃ ca tulyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2886: tatsahagataḥ samādhiḥ nirhārikā cetanā svabhāvaḥ samādhiradhiṣṭhānaṃ daśasu dikṣu aduḥkhāsukhikaḥ sattvadhātuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2888: puṇyaṃ karma yatsugativaipākyaṃ pañcagativedanīyaṃ ca kuśalaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2890: āniñjyaṃ karma yadrūpārūpyavaipākyaṃ rūpyārūpyavedanīyaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ca karma |
T06n1394u_003:2899: anāgataṃ karma yadanirvṛttaṃ vartamānaṃ karma yadabhisaṃskṛtamabhisañcitamanuparataṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2905: naiva śaikṣanāśaikṣaṃ karma tadubhayaṃ sthāpayitvā tadanyasantānikaṃ yat kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2915: yallokottaramanāsravaṃ karma trayāṇāmapi karmaṇāṃ prahāṇāya pratipakṣatvād vaṅkakṛrma yadito bāhyānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:2919: doṣakarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane viparītadarśināṃ svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyināṃ mithyāniścitānāṃ yatkuśalākuśalaṃ karma |
T06n1394u_003:2921: api khalu kaṣāyakarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane'
T06n1394u_003:2923: śucikarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ śāsane samyaṅniścitānāmasandigdhabuddhīnāṃ kuśalaṃ karma |
T06n1394u_003:2924: munikarma yadiha dhārmikāṇāmapṛthagjanānāmāryāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣaṃ kuśalaṃ karma |
T06n1394u_003:2932: yathāpi prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātādhikaraṇahetorātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāya dṛṣṭadhārmikamavadyaṃ prasavati sāmparāyikaṃ
T06n1394u_003:2935: prāṇivyābādhāya prayuktastato nidānaṃ vadhaṃ bandhanaṃ vā jyāniṃ vā garhaṇāṃ vā prāpnoti |
T06n1394u_003:2939: no tu tatonidānaṃ vadhaṃ vā yāvadgarhaṇāṃ vā nigacchati |
T06n1394u_003:2941: yattathaiva prayuktaḥ paraṃ ca vyābādhate tannidānaṃ ca parato vadhaṃ vā yāvadgarhaṇāṃ vā nigacchati |
T06n1394u_003:2946: kathaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate prāṇivyābādhāya prayuṅkte |
T06n1394u_003:2948: na cāsya prāṇātipātaḥ sampadyate yathepsitaḥ saḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2949: icchāmūla nidānaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate ||
T06n1394u_003:2950: api khalu daśādīnavā dauḥśīlye yathāsūtramevaṃ vistareṇa veditavyāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:2951: caturṇāṃ punarakuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ surāmaireyasya pañcamasyopāsakaśikṣāsambandhenādīnavā uktā bhagavatā te'
T06n1394u_003:2976: yathāpīhaikatyaścaṇḍālakuleṣu vā pukkasakuleṣu vā rathakārakuleṣu vā veṇukārakuleṣu vā iti yāni vā punaranyāni nīcāni adhamāni kṛcchrāṇi kṛcchravṛttīni parīttāni parīttānnapānabhojanāni ityevaṃrūpeṣu kuleṣvabhijāto bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:2979: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu vā iti yāni vā punaranyāni kulānyāḍhyāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni prabhūtavittopakaraṇāni prabhūtakṣetra svāpateyāni prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasannicayāni ityevaṃrūpeṣu kuleṣvabhijāto bhavati
T06n1394u_003:2992: apramāṇasaṃjñiṣu akiñcanasaṃjñiṣu naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñiṣu ca deveṣu janma ||
T06n1394u_003:2994: daśasu dikṣvaparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣyaparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmaparimāṇaṃ janma veditavyaṃ ||
T06n1394u_003:2998: yaccaturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakamato bahutaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ praghāritaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3000: dīrgharātraṃ yūyaṃ hastināṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapannā aśvānāmuṣṭrāṇāṃ gardabhānāmajāmahiṣavarāhakurkurāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3001: tatra yuṣmābhirbahūnyaṅgapratyaṅgacchedanānyanubhūtāni yatra yuṣmākaṃ prabhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ praghāritaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3003: tatra yuṣmābhiḥ prabhūtāni mātṛvyasanāni pitṛvyasanāni bhrātṛvyasanāni bhaginīvyasanāni jñātikṣayo dhanakṣayo bhogakṣayaścānubhūtaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3005: tadyathā rudhiramaśru ca evaṃ mātuḥstanyapānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3009: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā tadyathā yadasyā pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatra...taścaturaṅgulamātrāḥ kaṭhikāḥ kṛtvā mātāpitṛparamparāyāmupasthāpaye riyaṃ me mātā |
T06n1394u_003:3012: tasyāpi me piturayaṃ piteti kṣiprataraṃ khalu tāścaturaṅgulamātrāḥ kaṭhikā anenopakrameṇa parikṣayaṃ paryādāna gaccheyuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3015: yaccoktaṃ yaṃ yūyaṃ sattvaṃ paśyata duḥkhitaṃ parameṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgataṃ yūyaṃ tatrāvagacchatha asmābhirapyevaṃrūpāṇi duḥkhānyanubhūtāni
T06n1394u_003:3017: yathoktaṃ nāhaṃ taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sulabharūpaṃ paśyāmi yatra yūyaṃ dīrghasyādhvano'
T06n1394u_003:3019: nāhaṃ taṃ sattvaṃ sulabharūpaṃ paśyāmi yo yuṣmākaṃ dīgha syādhvano'
T06n1394u_003:3020: tyayātra mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vācāryo vopādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo veti |
T06n1394u_003:3023: tadyathā vipulapārśvaḥ parvataḥ sa cetsaṃhato bhavet |
T06n1394u_003:3037: yathā ca madhyānte sambhūto vartate vyavadānāya ca paraiti ||
T06n1394u_003:3038: kathaṃ pūrvāntānmadhyānte sambhavati sambhūtaśca madhyānte vartate |
T06n1394u_003:3039: yathāpīhaikatyena pūrvamaviduṣāvidyāgatenāvidyāpratyayaṃ puṇyāpuṇyāniñjyaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarma kṛtaṃ bhavatyupacitaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3041: adhyātmabahirdhā tṛṣṇā cāsya vijñānasya phalābhinirvṛttikāle sahāyabhāvena pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3043: dhvanyātmabhāvamabhinirvartayatyanupūrveṇa mātuḥ kukṣau hetuvijñānaṃ pratisandhiphalavijñānaṃ yāvadeva kalalatvādibhiravasthāviśeṣairuttarottaraistasya garbhagatasya nāmarūpasya yāvajjīrṇātvāya |
T06n1394u_003:3044: samanantara pratisandhibandhācca tasya vijñānasya yattadutpattisaṃvartanīyaṃ karma taddattaphalaṃ bhavati vipākataḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3048: sahabhūtaṃ cendriyarūpaṃ samanantaraviruddhaṃ ca nāma ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānānāṃ yathāyogamāśrayo yadāśritya yāvajjīvaṃ vijñānasya pravṛttirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3051: yacca nāma yenopādattānīndriyāṇi santānapatitaṃ pravāheṇa pravartate |
T06n1394u_003:3053: evaṃ hi vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3055: evaṃ hi pūrvāntānmadhyānte saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādasambhavo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3059: rūpiṣu sattveṣu kāmāvacareṣu rūpāvacareṣu aupapādukāyāṃ yonau pūrṇendriyaḥ prādurbhavatītyayaṃ viśeṣaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3060: ārūpyeṣu punarnāmāśritaṃ rūpaṃ jīvāśritaṃ ca vijñānaṃ vijñānāśritaṃ nāmarūpabījaṃ ca pravartate |
T06n1394u_003:3061: yataḥ punarbījātsamucchinnasyāpi rūpasyāyatyāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavatyayamatrāpi viśeṣaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3065: kathaṃ madhyāntādaparānte saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādasambhavo bhavati kathaṃ cāsambhavaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3067: sa tathā madhyānte sambhūtaḥ pudgalo dvividhaṃ pūrvakarmaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3068: ādhyātmikaṃ ca vipākaphalaṃ viṣamanirjātaṃ ca veditamadhipatiphalaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3071: so'dhyātmaṃ vipākaphale saṃmūḍhaḥ punarbhāvābhinirvṛttiṃ duḥkhato yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti |
T06n1394u_003:3072: sa pūrvāntikīṃ cāparāntikīṃ cāvidyāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat |
T06n1394u_003:3074: tasya tadvijñānamabhinavaṃ karma kurvatastatkarmopagaṃ bhavati dṛṣṭa eva dharme |
T06n1394u_003:3082: ayaṃ tāvat punarbhavasya madhyānte ākṣepako heturveditavyo yena vijñānādyo veditaparyavasānaḥ kṛtsna evātmabhāva ākṣipto bhavati ||
T06n1394u_003:3083: sapūrvakeṇa vipākaphalasammohenaiva punarbhavamākṣipya dvitīyena viṣayanirjātaphalasammohena viṣayavedanālambanāṃ tṛṣṇāmutpādayati yathā tṛṣṇayā kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ vāpadyamāno bhavaparyeṣaṇāṃ vā kāmopādānaṃ vopādadāti dṛṣṭiśīlavrato pādānaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:3084: upātte copādāne tṛṣṇopādānasahitasaṅgataḥ pūrvaka ākṣepako heturbhava ityucyate |
T06n1394u_003:3085: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetusaṃgṛhītasya ca bhavasyānantaraṃ kālaṃ kṛtavato yathākṣiptenākṣepahetunā vijñānādīnāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ veditaparyantānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavatyanukramaśo vā sakṛdvā |
T06n1394u_003:3086: evaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme avidyāsaṃsparśajā veditapratyayā tṛṣṇā |
T06n1394u_003:3092: evaṃ madhyānte avidyāpratyayān saṃskārān vedanāpratyayāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ pratītyāparānte saṃskārāṇāṃ samudayo bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3093: sacetpunaḥ parato ghoṣa pūrvasaṃskāraṃ vā dṛṣṭe dharme āgamya yoniśo dvividhānphalabhūtānsaṃskārānmanasi karoti teṣāṃ ca hetuṃ teṣāṃ ca nirodhaṃ teṣāṃ ca nirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3095: viśuddhaṃ ca satyeṣu krameṇa śaikṣāśaikṣaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pratilabhate |
T06n1394u_003:3096: sa tena jñānadarśanenāśeṣāṃ tāṃ cāvidyāṃ prajahāti tāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3100: tasya prahāṇādavidyāvirāgātprajñāvimuktiḥ sākṣātkṛtā bhavati dṛṣṭa eva dharme |
T06n1394u_003:3101: yā cāvidyāsaṃsparśajā veditasamprayukte citte samprayuktā tṛṣṇā rāgaśca tasya tasmāccittādvisaṃyogād rāgavirahāccetovimuktiḥ sākṣātkṛtā bhavati
T06n1394u_003:3102: tasyāvidyānirodhādye te tasyāmaprahīṇāyāmavidyāyāṃ saṃskāravijñānādayo vedanāparyantā aparāntamārabhya te notpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:3111: apravṛtteśca dṛṣṭe dharme sopadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvāṇaprāptirbhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3112: tasya tasminsamaye vijñānapratyayaṃ ca nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ca vijñānaṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ bhavati pariśuddhaṃ paryavadānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3114: vatiṣṭhate tāvadvisaṃyukto vedanāṃ vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3116: yadā cāsyāyuṣaḥ kṣayādvijñānamupāttaṃ kāyaṃ vijahāti tasya jīvitendriyaṃ cordhvamasmājjīvitendriyādaśeṣaṃ paryādīyate nottaratra vipacyate |
T06n1394u_003:3117: tacca vijñānaṃ saha sarvaveditairiha ca svasvanirodhādanyatra ca pūrvameva hetunirodhādapratisandhito'
T06n1394u_003:3119: ayaṃ ca nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhāturatyantaśāntaṃ padaṃ yasyārthe nirvāṇopagaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ bhagavato'
T06n1394u_003:3121: tadidaṃ tribhirākāraiḥ pratītyasamutpādasya vyavasthānaṃ vistareṇa pratyuktaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3122: pūrvāntānmadhyānte pravṛttito madhyāntādaparānte pravṛttito madhyānte ca pravṛtiviśuddhitaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3129: sattvalokacyutyutpattimukhena bhājanalokasaṃvartavivartamukhena āhāropastambhamukhena karmasvakatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā iṣṭāniṣṭakarmatadanurūpa phalopabhogamukhena prabhāvamukhena vyavadānamukhena ca |
T06n1394u_003:3159: adhyātmamayoniśaḥ kathaṃkathībhavataḥ ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3178: vitathaṃ karma tatphalaṃ cāyoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3180: buddhānāṃ bodhimamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3182: dharmasya svākhyātatāmamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3184: saṅghasya supratipattimamanasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3187: manasi kurvato vā mithyā vā manasi kurvataḥ pramādyato vā kāṅkṣato vāpavadato vā yadajñānāṃ yathā duḥkhe evaṃ samudaye nirodhe mārge ajñānāni draṣṭavyāni ||
T06n1394u_003:3189: ahetukaṃ vā kalpayato viṣamahetuṃ vā īśvaraprakṛtipuruṣāntarādikaṃ vāyoniśaḥ kalpayato yadajñānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3205: yacca viṃśatividhamajñānaṃ yacca saptavidhamajñānaṃ tatra kena kasya saṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3215: yaccaikāntaviṃśatividhamajñānaṃ yacca pañcavidhaṃ katamena kasya saṃgraho draṣṭavyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3218: pramādasaṃmohena karmaṇi vipāke tadubhaye cājñānasya saṃgrahaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3223: vidyā itīme ṣaḍavidyāparyāyāḥ saptavidhe saṃmohavastuni yathākramaṃ draṣṭavyāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3228: śrutamayyāścintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyāśca prajñāyā vipakṣeṇa trayaḥ paryāyā yathākramaṃ yojyante |
T06n1394u_003:3229: tasyā eva vipakṣabhūtāyā mṛdumadhyādhimātratvādapare punastrayaḥ paryāyā iti vipakṣaprabhedataśca svabhāvaprabhedataśca ṣaṭ paryāyāḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3231: kāyakarma kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ puṇyāpuṇyasaṃkhyātamadha ūrdhvaṃ punarāniñjyasaṃkhyātaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3237: tat kāmadhātau puṇyāpuṇyaṃ nāneñjyaṃ dvayoruparimayordhātvorāniñjyameva ca ||
T06n1394u_003:3239: āyatyāṃ cakṣurindriyāśrayā yā rūpaprativijñaptiryatpuṇyāpuṇyāneñjyaṃ paribhāvitabījabhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ yacca tadbījasamudbhūtaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3261: dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ ca rūpaṃ daśa kāmāvacarāṇi prajñaptipatitaṃ ca dharmāyatanarūpaṃ aṣṭau rūpāvacarāṇi dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:3265: cakṣurvijñānasaṃniśrayo rūpaprasādo yena rūpāṇi paśyatpaśyati drakṣyati vā |
T06n1394u_003:3268: tadapi dvividhaṃ nāmarūpaparigṛhītabījabhūtaṃ tadabhinirvartitaphalabhūtaṃ ca kāmāvacaraṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3280: yatsukhasthānīyamindriya viṣayaṃ pratītyotpadyate sātaṃ vedayitaṃ vedanāgataṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3285: yadaduḥkhāsukhasthānīyaṃ dvayaṃ pratītyotpadyate naiva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ vedayitaṃ vedanāgataṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3288: aduḥkhāsukhā caturthāddhyānādūrdhvaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāt tā api vedanā dvividhāḥ sparśabījaparigṛhītabījabhūtāstadabhinirvartitaphalabhūtāśca
T06n1394u_003:3290: kāmāvacarān saṃskārānpratītya kāmāvacareṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yathā kāmadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati |
T06n1394u_003:3292: yā rūpāvacarānsaṃskārānpratītya rūpāvacareṣu saṃskāreṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yathā rūpadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati |
T06n1394u_003:3294: yārūpyāvacarānsaṃskārānpratītyārūpyāvacareṣu saṃskāreṣu kliṣṭā prārthanā yayā rūpadhātau duḥkhamabhinirvartayati ||
T06n1394u_003:3310: narakatiryakpreta manuṣyabhavān sthāpayitvā tadanyo rūpabhavo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3313: kimadhikṛtya sapta bhavā vyavasthāpitā narakatiryakpretadevamanuṣya karmāntarābhavāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3329: ya āsveva yoniṣvavasthāsu ca pañcānāmupādānaskandhānāṃ sambhavaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3339: yaśca jāteḥ svabhāvaḥ yatra ca jāyate yaiśca hetupratyayaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ yena copastammenāhṛtena sahajena ca dhriyata ityayaṃ samāsārthaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3353: yā gamaneryāpathaprabhāvitā kāyasaṃsthānatā tadudbhavā ca gāḍhaśvasanakāmanatā |
T06n1394u_003:3374: āśrayavipariṇāmaḥ keśavipariṇāmaḥ puṣṭivipariṇāmastejobalavipariṇāma ārogyavipariṇāmo varṇavipariṇāma īryāpathavipariṇāmo'
T06n1394u_003:3402: yathā ca cyutiḥ cyutasya ca tadūrdhvaṃ yaḥ kālaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3421: aparo'nukramaparyāyo dvividhapratyayaṃ pratītyasamutpādamārabhya ātmabhāvapratyayaṃ viṣayopabhogapratyayaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:3428: karmaṇā tadvijñānasahāyena trividhamāyatyāṃ duḥkhamabhinirvartayati indriyanirvṛttisaṃgṛhītaṃ tatparipūrisaṃgṛhītaṃ viṣayaparibhogasaṃgṛhītaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:3429: sparśāvasānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ca dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme sparśapratyayāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāmutpādya viṣayapratyayāṃ paryeṣaṇāmāpadyate |
T06n1394u_003:3431: vyavasāyamukhena lābhasaṃskāramukhena śīlavratamukhena mokṣamukhena kāmaparyeṣaṇāmātmabhāvaparyeṣaṇāṃ mokṣaparyeṣaṇāṃ viṣayaparibhogapratyayaparyeṣaṇāṃ mithyāparyeṣaṇāmāpadyamānaḥ kleśāṃśca tatpūrvakāṇi karmāṇi kṛtvā pañcagatike saṃsāre jāyate jīryati mriyate ca ||
T06n1394u_003:3435: tatra prathamāḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ nirodhayanti śuklapakṣeṇa na vardhayanti |
T06n1394u_003:3436: dvitīyāḥ sattvāḥ satyāni yathābhūtamajānānā upasthitasmṛtayaḥ puṇyamāneñjyaṃ ca sāsravaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ karma kṛtvānupasthitayā vā punaḥ smṛtyā puṇyaṃ vipratisāraparibhāvitena vāvipratisāraprāmodyaparibhāvitena vā cetasā bahulaṃ viharanti |
T06n1394u_003:3439: tṛtīyānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratyutpannaviṣayaparibhogaje vedite vartamānānāṃ pūrvavadaparāṇi ṣaḍaṅgāni kramaśo draṣṭavyāni tṛṣṇādyāni jarāmaraṇāvasānāni
T06n1394u_003:3440: kena kāraṇena pratilomānupūrvyā jarāmaraṇamidaṃ kṛtvā pratītyasamutpādo deśyate satyanayadeśanāmadhikṛtya |
T06n1394u_003:3443: yaduktaṃ bhagavatā na ca nāmarūpanirodhapūrvaṅgamā dharmā iti |
T06n1394u_003:3444: kena kāraṇena avidyānirodhapūrvaṅgamā noktāḥ vimukticetasāṃ tatprajñapteḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3445: ...tvāt teṣāṃ hi dṛṣṭe dharme bījabhūtaṃ vedanāvasānaṃ niruddhaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3446: dṛṣṭe ca dharme vedanāṃ vedayamānasya tṛṣṇānuśayasamuddhātādapravṛtterniruddhā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3451: pratigatya gatiṣu saṃyuktānāṃ kleśairutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpāda ityakṣaranirvacanaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3463: tataḥ saiva saṃjñā niruḍhā pratītyasamutpāda iti ||
T06n1394u_003:3475: yadi hetupratyayena na pratyayāni tatkena kāraṇena hetuphalabhāvena pratītyasamutpādo nirdiśyate |
T06n1394u_003:3482: dṛṣṭe ca dharme samparāye ca vijñānādīni vedanāvasānāni jātijarāmaraṇāvasāni ||
T06n1394u_003:3484: yadā yoniśomanaskārahetukā vidyoktā kena kāraṇena sa pratītyasamutpādanirdeśa ādito na nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3489: avidyā ca svabhāvasaṃkliṣṭā ayoniśo manaskāraśca svabhāvasaṃkliṣṭaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3495: kena kāraṇena svabhāvaḥ svabhāvasya pratyayatvena noktaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3496: nahi svabhāvaḥ pratyayāntaramalabhamānaḥ svabhāvasya saṃkleśataḥ poṣako vā bhāvako vā bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3498: kena kāraṇena puṇyāneñjyāḥ saṃskārā pratisaṃkhyāya manukṛtā avidyāpratyayā ityucyante |
T06n1394u_003:3502: yadā lobhadveṣamohanidānaṃ karmoktaṃ tatkena kāraṇena mohanidānamevocyate |
T06n1394u_003:3505: yadā cetanāsamutthāpitatvātkāyavākkarmaṇaḥ saṃskārapratyayā abhisaṃskārā kena kāraṇenāvidyāpratyayā evocyante |
T06n1394u_003:3507: yadā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpapratyayamapi kena kāraṇenāsminnarthe saṃskārapratyayamevocyate |
T06n1394u_003:3510: yadā nāmarūpaṃ mahābhūtānyupādāya sparśamapi kena kāraṇena vijñānapratyayamevocyate |
T06n1394u_003:3511: vijñānasya tadabhinavotpattihetutvānmahābhūtāni sparśaśca kevalamutpannasya pratiṣṭhāheturbhavatyutpattikāle ca yadā ṣaḍ dhātūnpratītya mātuḥ kukṣau garbhasyāvakrāntiruktā kena kāraṇena vijñānadhāturevoktaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3512: sati hi vijñānadhātau niyataṃ mātuḥ kukṣau śukraśoṇitamahābhūtakukṣi cchidrāvaikalyātpradhāno vijñānadhāturiti kṛtvā sarvayonibhavotpattyadhikārācca
T06n1394u_003:3516: yadā trikasamavāyapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ kena kāraṇena ṣaḍāyatanapratyaya evoktaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3517: sati ṣaḍāyatane tadanyadvayāvaikalyātṣaḍāyatanapradhānaṃ pradhānamiti kṛtvā dvayasaṃgrahācca ṣaḍāyatanasya ||
T06n1394u_003:3518: yadātmopakramikāḥ paropakramikā ṛtuvipariṇāmikā pūrvakarmāhṛtāśca vedanā upalabhyante kena kāraṇeneha sparśapratyayā eva paridīpitāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3520: sparśāhārakatvācca tadanyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ tā api vedanāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3522: yadā tṛṣṇāvidyāpratyayāpyuktā tatsthānīyaviṣayapratyayā ca kena kāraṇeneha vedanāpratyayaivoktā |
T06n1394u_003:3523: yasmādvedanāvaśādviṣayasaṃyogaprārthanā pravartate tadupame viṣaye mohavaśāttu kevalaṃ tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayāstaṅgādīnyathābhūtamaprajānantastataścittaṃ na nivārayanti ||
T06n1394u_003:3524: yadānuśayādaprahīṇāntasthānīyebhyaśca dharmasya upādānasya prabhavo bhavati kena kāraṇeneha tṛṣṇāpratyayamevopādānamucyate |
T06n1394u_003:3529: upādānabalena yasmāttadeva karma tasmiṃstasminnupapattyāyatane vijñānanāmarūpādyākarṣaṇa samarthaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3530: yadā śukraśoṇitādipratyayāpi jātiḥ kena kāraṇena bhavapratyayaivoktā |
T06n1394u_003:3531: bhave sati niyataṃ tadanyapratyayāvaikalyasadbhāvāt sa eva pradhānaḥ pratyaya iti kṛtvā |
T06n1394u_003:3562: kena kāraṇena vijñānādīni vedanāvasānāni jātijarāmaraṇāni ca dvidhākhyātāni |
T06n1394u_003:3581: avidyā saṃskārāṇāṃ kiṃ sahabhāvena pratyayaḥ athānantaraniruddhaḥ pratyayaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3618: yathā bhavo jāterevaṃ jātirjarāmaraṇasya pratyayatvena draṣṭavyā |
T06n1394u_003:3620: pradhānāṅgatastathopādānaparigṛhītasya karmaṇo yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ sakalāṅgataḥ karmaṇo vijñānādīnāṃ ca vedanāvasānānāṃ bījabhūtānāmupādānaparigṛhītānāṃ bhavato vyavasthānaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3621: kimeṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāmetadeva karma yaduta saṃskārādīnāṃ jarāmaraṇāvasānānāmanupūrvapratyayatvamathānyadapi kiñcit |
T06n1394u_003:3622: etacca sve sve gocare ca sarveṣāṃ yathāyogaṃ vṛttirdvitīyaṃ karma draṣṭavyaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3624: avidyā yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi pratyayaḥ samāsannapratyayārthena punaḥ saṃskārāṇāmeva nirdiṣṭā ||
T06n1394u_003:3635: kena kāraṇena jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati |
T06n1394u_003:3638: kena kāraṇena jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ nānyatra jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamucyate |
T06n1394u_003:3640: anenaiva vyapadeśena svasāntānikātpratyayāt svasantāna eva tadanyotpādārthena ||
T06n1394u_003:3641: ye dharmā avidyāpratyayena saṃskārā api te |
T06n1394u_003:3642: ye vā saṃskārā avidyāpratyayā api te syuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3643: saṃskārā nāvidyāpratyayā anāsravā anivṛtāvyākṛtāśca kāyavāṅmanaḥsaṃskārāḥ syuravidyāpratyayā na saṃskārāḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3644: saṃskārasaṃgṛhītaṃ bhavāṅgaṃ sthāpayitvā yāni tadanyāni bhavāṅgāni |
T06n1394u_003:3646: puṇyānejyāḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥsaṃskārāḥ etānākārān sthāpayitvā ca caturthī koṭiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3654: vijñānaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ ca yatpaunarbhavikaṃ bījabhūtaṃ phalabhūtaṃ vā |
T06n1394u_003:3661: uttare vimokṣe yā prārthanā yāṃ ca tṛṣṇāṃ kuśalaṃ niśritya tṛṣṇāṃ prajahāti |
T06n1394u_003:3663: vidyāsaṃsparśajāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya ye tadanye dharmā utpadyante |
T06n1394u_003:3665: vedanāpratyayā ca tṛṣṇā ca kliṣṭā tṛṣṇā avidyāsaṃsparśajaveditapratyayā ||
T06n1394u_003:3669: atra paścātpadakaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yattāvadupādānaṃ sarvaṃ tattṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ syāttu tṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ nopādānaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3671: ye ca kuśalāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya ārabdhavīryādayaḥ kuśalā dharmā utpadyante ||
T06n1394u_003:3673: yo vā bhavaḥ sarvaḥ sa upādānapratyayaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3678: yā yā bhavapratyayā sarvā sā jātiḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3679: yā vā jātiḥ sarvā sā bhavapratyayā |
T06n1394u_003:3688: eṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāṃ kati samyagdṛṣṭisaṃgṛhītasya mārgasyāṅgāni prādhānyena vibandhabhūtāni |
T06n1394u_003:3690: yathā samyagdṛṣṭerevaṃ samyaksaṃkalpasya samyagvyāyāmasya samyagvyāyāmasya samyagvākkarmāntājīvānāṃ kāyavāksaṃskārā bhavaikadeśaśca vibandhabhūtaḥ
T06n1394u_003:3692: eṣāṃ bhavāṅgānāṃ katyaṅgānyekāntena saṃkleśapakṣyāṇi kati saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣyāṇi |
T06n1394u_003:3695: jātiryāpāyeṣvakṣaṇeṣu vā tadanyeṣu vā sā saṃkleśapakṣyā |
T06n1394u_003:3696: yā punardevamanuṣyeṣvakṣaṇavivarjiteṣu jātiḥ sā saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣyā draṣṭavyā |
T06n1394u_003:3701: avidyānirodhādavidyānirodhe tannirodhācca tannirodhe sati tataḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3714: yathā vijñānanāmarūpayornayastathā yathāyogamavaśiṣṭānāmaṅgānāṃ draṣṭavyo yāvad vedanāvasānāt |
T06n1394u_003:3715: yathā'vidyāpratyayānāṃ saṃskārāṇāmevaṃ tṛṣṇāpratyayasyopādānasya upādānapratyayasya ca bhavasya draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3717: yathā vijñānapratyayānāṃ nāmarūpādīnāṃ tathā jātipratyayasya jarāmaraṇasya ||
T06n1394u_003:3720: yathā saṃskārapratyayasya vijñānasya tathāsyāpi nayo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3721: yo'sāvaṣṭamukhaḥ pratītyasamutpāda uktasteṣāṃ kati mukhāni dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādaprabhāvitāni |
T06n1394u_003:3733: yathā pūrvāntasahagatānyevamaparāntasahagatāni pūrvāntāparāntasahagatāni sthāmaśaḥ parāmarśasthāyī sopādānaḥ saparitāpanaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3734: na dṛṣṭe dharme parinirvātyayaṃ pañcama ādīnavaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3759: vedanāvyāmiśranirdeśyā sāmparāyikī ca sparśapratyayā hetubhūtā dṛṣṭadhārmikī ca |
T06n1394u_003:3761: te come sparśapratyaye kṛtvā vyāmiśre nirdiśyete ||
T06n1394u_003:3778: yāni duḥkhasahagatāni yaccāvedanāsahagatamaṅgaṃ tasya ca pradeśaḥ ||
T06n1394u_003:3781: syāttu saṃskāraduḥkhatayā saṃgṛhītāni na tadanyābhyāṃ duḥkhatābhyāṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3785: asaṃjñikaṃ nirodhasamāpattyasaṃjñisamāpattyośca rūpīṇyupalabhyante nārūpīṇi ārūpyeṣūpapannasya punararūpīṇyupalabhyante na rūpīṇi ||
T06n1394u_003:3807: yānyaṅgāni kuśalasāsravāṇi tāni kiṃ na śaikṣāṇi |
T06n1394u_003:3809: śaikṣasya tu kuśalasāsravā dharmāḥ pravṛtivairodhikā vidyāpratyayāśca |
T06n1394u_003:3819: katibhirnirdeśaiḥ pratītyasamutpādo nirdiśyate teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu |
T06n1394u_003:3821: anulomanirdeśena pratilomanirdeśena ekadeśāṅganirdeśena sakalāṅganirdeśena kṛṣṇapakṣanirdeśena śuklapakṣanirdeśena ||
T06n1394u_003:3829: na ca bījapratyayayostajjananaṃ prati kācidīhā vā ceṣṭā vā vyāpāro vā vidyate |
T06n1394u_003:3830: naca bījapratyayayorīhā vā ceṣṭā vā vyāpāro vā vidyate |
T06n1394u_003:3832: anādipratiṣiddhalakṣaṇāni cāṅgāni pratikṣaṇaṃ ca nava-nava-lakṣaṇāni pravartante |
T06n1394u_003:3835: tatra duḥkhārthamārabhya duḥkhaikarasalakṣaṇāni cāṅgāni triprakāratayā ca khyānti |
T06n1394u_003:3836: tatra śūnyārthamārabhya sattvakārakaduḥkhavirahitāni cāṅgāni tadavirahitānīva ca khyānti nirdiśyante ca ||
T06n1394u_003:3848: na haiva mayā pratītyasamutpādaḥ kṛto nāpyanyairapi tūtpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveyaṃ dharmatā dharmasthitidharmadhāturiti |
T06n1394u_003:3849: katamā dharmatā katamā dharmasthitiḥ katamo dharmadhātuḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3854: yaduktaṃ jātiścenna syādapi nu kasyacitkasmiṃścideva jātiḥ syāt |
T06n1394u_003:3855: sarvaśo vā jātyāmasatyāṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ prajñāyeteti |
T06n1394u_003:3858: yasmiṃśca sati paścāttānyeva phalabhūtāni bhavapratyayā jātirityucyate ||
T06n1394u_003:3860: yathā sarveṣāmaṅgānāṃ nānyonyapratyayatvamuktaṃ kena kāraṇena nāmarūpavijñānayoranyonyapratyayatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
T06n1394u_003:3864: mātṛkukṣau pratisandhikāle anyonyapratyayatvādvijñānapratyayairmātuḥ kukṣau śukraśoṇitarūpaṃ nāma parigṛhītaṃ kalalatvāya sammūrchate |
T06n1394u_003:3866: kena kāraṇena bodhisattvasya kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ vyavalokayato vijñānātpratyudāvartate mānasaṃ na tvanyebhyo'ṅgebhyaḥ |
T06n1394u_003:3868: tasya yathā vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavalokayato vijñānātpratyudāvṛttaṃ |
T06n1394u_003:3871: nivṛttipakṣe tu nāmarūpe na paunarbhavikasya vijñānasya nivṛttiheturyena paraḥ pratyavekṣitavān ||
T06n1394u_003:3872: kena kāraṇena svayaṃkṛtāni na parakṛtāni nobhayakṛtāni nāpyahetusamutpannānyetānyaṅgānyucyante |
T06n1394u_003:3887: kena kāraṇena kṛṣṇapakṣanirdeśataḥ pratītyasamutpāda ācaya ityucyate |
T06n1394u_003:3902: katīnāmaṃgānāṃ nirodhaḥ vedanākṣayaprabhāvitaḥ prahīṇeṣu kleśeṣu skandhanirodhakāla ihaiva sarvaveditoparamādekasya ||
T06n1394u_003:3904: sahetukasaṃkleśajñānodbhāvanārthaṃ ca svasantatau svayaṃkṛtakleśodbhāvanārthaṃ ca pūrvāntādaṅgānāmanādikālatvodbhāvanārthaṃ ca aparāntādaṅgānāṃ saṃkleśanivṛttyavakāśodbhāvanārthaṃ ca |
T06n1394u_003:3909: tatra kāmadhātau jāto bhūtaḥ kāmāvacareṇāśrayeṇordhvabhūmikaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ cābhinirharati |
T06n1394u_003:3912: traidhātukāvacaraṃ punarmanastenaivāśrayeṇa saṃmukhīkarotyaparyāpannaṃ ca rūpārūpyadhātau jāto'
T06n1394u_003:3914: asya khalu trividhasya saṃkleśasya kleśasaṃkleśasya karmasaṃkleśasya janmasaṃkleśasya ca prahāṇāya ṣaḍvidho'
T06n1394u_003:3920: yogācārabhūmau savitarkā savicārā avitarkā vicāramātrā avitarkāvicārā bhūmiḥ samāptā ||
